text: Great prices, food is good, employees r friendly and helpful..clean.

name: Karin Mack
text: Did a good job. Some employees not to friendly.

name: Larry Tooley
text:
Nice, knowledgeable, and professional staff.
Checked my fluids and refused payment..
Haven't run into a business this courteous in a LONG time... I would recommend this business to anyone, just based on this.

name: Tullus Hester
text: People there were really nice and I would go back there

name: Matt
text: Highly recommend shopping around before choosing this place. Most importantly I dropped my car off and was told I’d get a call with a quote before the work was started for approval, I never got that call and was only called once the job was completed and told the cost of the repair. The amount of the repair was on the high end for repairs and definitely warranted a call before any work was done. I’d understand if the repair cost was less than 1k but this job was not and I just had to take their word for it that that’s what was needed. The owner of the place had the great response to my questioning of why I wasn’t called of, well why did you have your car towed here if you didn’t want it fixed, and that they can just put my old parts back in it and let me tow it away. Incredibly unprofessional response for the owner of a shop, he could have at least owned up to the mistake and I wouldn’t have been as bothered by the lack of communication. Instead he tried to put the blame on me and his front desk employee. If you want a professional mechanic to work on your car do not take it here, if you saw where this shop was and looked you’d probably choose to turn away anyway but before you get there take my advice and keep looking for other options.

name: Big D's Shade Tree
text: They took the time to check out my truck. Ran all sorts of computer scans, did a road test, and even out it up on jacks to have a look underneath. My problem was deemed to unrelated to the transmission. They told me what to do to fix it myself or where I could take it. When I tried to pay, he said No Charge. Other shops wanted $50 just to look at it. I have a new transmission shop that will be doing all my work from now on.

name: Tracy Armstrong
text: Great people! Took a look at the car for free... Another shop said I needed a transmission rebuild/ replacement based off a engine code alone originating from an air intake hose disconnect. Madison transmission said nothing was wrong with the transmission and sent me on my way and told me to come back if I have any issues with the car.

name: Spencer Brothers
text: Great price for a brand new transmission! They are the place to go to for any transmission issues.

name: Arden Boddie
text: Fast and friendly service. He will have you changing gear in no time at all. Lol!

name: Stephanie Sanders
text: Love this place. Great workers and amazing prices. Quick with their work and it's done correctly.

name: Keith Jackson
text: They did fix the car, but it took them two attempts.  Would go again I guess.

name: Ken Klispie
text: Excellent service! The team at Guthrie's did a thorough inspection of our new/used minivan after it started making various intermittent sounds from a long cross country drive. They were able to pinpoint several issues that were small but would have left us stranded on our next big trip. Quick, very reasonable and communicative through the repairs. We did our next long trip without any issues or noises. We know where we will be taking all of our cars for service, thank you!

resp.text: Thank you, Ken for the review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to help with your automotive needs. Welcome to Alabama!!!

name: Steven Richardson
text: We were traveling through Alabama and my pickup broke down right off the 310 Cullom exit. The tow truck driver recommended Guthrie.  We were nervous not knowing anyone but were pleasantly surprised. We received text updates and a phone call to explain what needed to be done.  They exceeded our expectation completing the job quickly and at a fair price. Highly recommend their auto shop. God Bless.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Steven. We appreciate your kind words. We always try to get people back on the road. I know what it is like to be broken down on the road. Especially if you are on a schedule. Thank you so much for choosing Guthrie's Auto Service.

name: Michael Blair
text: Our car started experiencing some pretty severe issues on our drive home to Tennessee from Florida. We genuinely could not have chosen a better exit to pull over at! We pulled Guthrie's Auto up on our Maps and decided to take our car over there. Despite how busy they were, they were very understanding that we were from out of town and immediately got to work on our vehicle and offered recommendations on places to eat around since we had to wait several hours! Absolutely awesome service!

resp.text: We appreciate your words, and the 5 stars. We strive to give everyone a 5 star experience and help them along their way. Thanks again. Terry Guthrie

name: Victor Cornell
text: I've taken my cars there several times and always got good professional service which was reasonably priced.

resp.text: Thank you Victor, we appreciate your business. Terry

name: teresa cobbs
text: Great people. Keep you updated on progress and prices. Very trustworthy.

resp.text: Thank you Teresa, we appreciate your business and kind words. Terry

name: Barbara
text:
A Great Place/Great People... Our truck broke down & Triple A couldn’t have found a better place to take it to! They took us to our hotel & picked us back up....The owner went above & beyond to get our truck fixed so we could be back on the road this morning! Truck is running great again! Thank You So much for not only getting our truck fixed but for your kind & thoughtfulness.
Rick, Barbara & LACI

resp.text: It was a pleasure to meet you two. I was happy to help you all with your F-250 diesel. Glad you were able to get back on the road any get out of the flooding that we had that day. We were safe but got a lot of rain that day. Thanks again for letting us to serve you.

name: Janice McGahey
text: They got my car fixed in no time flat. The cost was super reasonable. And it’s been several weeks everything is running perfectly. I would highly recommend Terry and his crew!!

resp.text: Janice, thank you for your review! We're glad we could provide a quality auto repair service for you and we'll see you soon!

name: La Donna Griffin
text: I received very good service, both times I brought my car to Guthrie's.  Very nice employees., and patient with the questions I ask.  I'll be back.  I've recommended Guthrie's to a few people.

resp.text: Thank you La Donna for the 4 stars. We hoped to give you a 5 star experience when we serviced your Kia. Maybe next time. We do appreciate you trusting us with your vehicle. Terry Guthrie

name: Page Sparks
text: A couple years ago my car was really in a bad way, and took it to the dealership. They were going to charge me $1500 for my repair. I despaired and reached out to friends and family for recommendations. A good friend recommended Guthrie's, said they always did good work. So I called them up. For the same repair they were going to have to charge close to $900. It was better but still hurt. Took my car up and waited. Got a call from Mike and he said that he wanted to check over the car before I spent all that money. He discovered what the dealership didn't, that something was just unplugged. Only charged the diagnostic fee! He could have charged me fully, but he and this business have been ethical. I take my car to them anytime I have issues, and they've been precise and sure every time. Would highly recommend for anyone who's been burned by bad mechanics.

resp.text: Page, thank you for your review. We were happy to have been able to help you out with your vehicle and to save you money. We appreciate having you as a customer and we look forward to seeing you next time!

name: Hustle Hard Fitness
text: Very caring and reliable crew Terry and them have always took care of our car needs and always does a fantastic job! Great prices and they get it done it a timely manner

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review! We'll continue to provide a caring and reliable atmosphere for your auto repair needs and we look forward to helping you in the future!

name: Felicia Wright
text: Took my vehicle to have my AC looked at. They were very friendly and knowledgeable. Seemed to want to help me more than just make a dollar. They have a text system set up that notifies you when your vehicle is being worked on. The owner follows up with you a day or so after you pick up your vehicle to be sure everything is going well. Very personable business.

resp.text: Felicia, thank you for your review! We're happy to have looked at your A/C and we'll continue to be friendly and knowledgeable.

name: John Thomas
text: Broke down while traveling. They was very helpful and willing to get our truck repaired at very reasonable rates. I highly recommend Guthrie's Auto Service.

resp.text: John, thank you for your review, we hope you had safe traveling after visiting our auto repair shop, and please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: Bettie Burnett
text: Had car towed to Guthrie's for repair on coolant system. Had been told by two regular customers that they do really good work. The office attendant (Mike, I think was his name), was straight-forward, respectful, patient, gave me a phone quote, had the work done timely, with the final bill ending up being a little less than the original quote, even after adding the tow bill & taxes. It was a very welcomed change from the experience I'd had at another local shop I'd been referred to (but later warned about from several other past customers) where I repeatedly had to endure rudeness from the know-it-all mechanic, immediate breakdowns from same issue I'd just paid to have repaired, & ignored voicemails asking to speak to the owner. Guthrie's owner followed-up the very next day to make sure everything was going well with the work on my car. I would much rather pay for a job well done the first time than a little less and keep breaking down, having my car towed, finding another way to work at the last minute to keep my job, and then constantly being talked down to in person & over the phone (while the owner justifies it as him "being from New York",... to which I reminded them both that he's now n ALABAMA, & that cocky attitude won't do here, especially with me!!... 3 different types of repairs... never fixed after being told they were!). So, yes, I am very happy to give Guthrie's a positive review, THANK YOU!

resp.text: Bettie, thank you for your review. We were happy to help out with your coolant system repair and we are glad to be respectful, honest, and patient for all of our customers. We are sorry you had a bad experience at a different shop, but thank you for trusting us to get the job done. See you later!

name: Randy Anderson
text: Took my '08 Tundra in for some pretty major repairs (stuck secondary air intake valve, timing belt replacement, pulley repair). I’m beyond pleased with the quality of the work, the affordable price, and the speed of service you guys gave me. I’m new to the area, and will be coming back to you guys for any vehicle work that I need, and I’ll make sure to tell everyone else I meet about you as well! Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Randy! We're glad we could help you out with your '08 Tundra repairs, and we'll continue to offer quality and affordable auto repair services, and we are excited to have you as our customer. See you next time!

name: hotrodford 88
text: Great people to deal with.

name: Jeffrey Stevens
text: They were AAA approved brought truck in for water pump replacement they repaired it in a timely manner and did a over all inspection people were very friendly

resp.text: Jeffrey, thank you for your leaving us a review. We're glad to have helped you out and let us know if there anything we can do for you!

name: Cheryl Masterson
text: I was traveling thru Cullman car wouldn't start.  They repaired it same day. What a blessing, excellent service.

resp.text: Cheryl, we're so glad we could help you out while you were traveling through Cullman. Thank you for trusting us with your auto repair needs!

name: Mark Maddox
text: My truck needed help. I planned on it being in the shop for 7 to 10 days. I dropped it off on a Monday afternoon, and received a call on Friday afternoon that it was ready. Never did I think anyone could repair or replace as many things as Guthrie's did in such a short time. I left Guthrie's and drove to Gulf Shores. The true test, interstate highway's in Alabama. They did a great job. No vibration, shaking, or leaking. Awesome job guys. Thanks.

resp.text: Mark, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! Here at Guthrie's Auto Service, we understand how important your vehicle is to you. That is why we always strive to provide quality care in a timely manner. It was a pleasure to work on your truck and we're thrilled to hear that your drive to Gulf Shores was smooth. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Jason Bookout
text: We were from out of town and our car broke down late on a Friday afternoon. Terry the owner fixed our busted coolant hose and had us back on the road in less than 2 hours for a fair price. He did not take advantage of a situation where we had no other choice.  I have later heard from other friends in the area that Terry does great work. Would highly recommend if you are in the area.

resp.text: Jason, we appreciate your kind review and were happy to assist with your coolant hose. We understand how frustrating it can be to deal with vehicle issues when you are out of town, so we were glad we could fix it quickly so you can be on your way. Thank you and please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you in the future!

name: tanya roberson
text: Very courteous, professional, high quality service! They solved our overheating issue and fixed it Fast! Highly recommend!! Best auto service in Cullman!!

resp.text: Tanya, thank you for your review! We're excited to continue to be courteous, professional, and provide high quality service! Looking forward to seeing you next time!

name: Xochitl Robinson
text: Terry was very helpful and pleasant.I went there to have an stimate on a problem that I have in my SUV. The place is very clean.prices are reasonable. Thanks Terry.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We appreciate your support of our auto repair shop!

name: Justin Nichols
text: Needed help tracking a power draw draining my battery, they found it and got everything sorted very quickly. I was very pleased with the service and I will absolutely use them for future repairs.

resp.text: Justin, thank you for your review! We're glad we could be here to help with your battery, and we'll look forward to seeing you next time in our auto repair shop!

name: Douglas Ballenger
text:
I was really surprised by the service and friendliness of Guthries auto service, after I spent 2 weeks working on my vehicle with no luck finding the problem I decided to find a shop to work on it. A friend of mine recommended Guthries. Some of problems I was having with my vehicle was, lost power to all of my windows, lost power to my rear view mirror and backup camera, blown bulb in taillights, short causing battery to drain, could not turn ignition switch All the way off so I couldn’t get key out 🤔😂 but the power door lock still worked!!
But don’t lock them if you have something draining your battery ! 🙃 Seriously Guthries will be my go to from now on ! Very friendly service, very knowledgeable and very fair service pricing!! I’m not going to say what my vehicle problem was ask Mike when you take your vehicle 🚗 in.

To all at Guthries auto service,

Thank you 🙏

resp.text: Douglas, we appreciate your kind review. We were more than happy to help you out of a tricky situation with your vehicle, and we'll continue to be friendly, knowledgeable, and fair-priced for your future visits. Thank you and we'll see you again!

name: Marie Lindsey
text: Great service and repairs. Called me as they found issues and got my approval before all repairs. Even checked with me the next day to make sure everything was working. I will take my other vehicles there for any service or repairs. Very satisfied customer!

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback, Marie! Our goal is to provide quality repairs to all of our customers along with excellent communication to keep our customers in the loop. We look forward to working with you again in the future.

name: Emily Taylor
text: I've used this shop for a number of repairs on my older vehicle now. Their prices are fair, the staff are all friendly and knowledgeable, and they are very expedient! I never have to wait long when I call, they're usually able to schedule my repair for the same week, and they always complete my repair in less time than expected.  They also send valuable customer loyalty coupons!

resp.text: Emily, we are glad to have you as a customer in our shop. We will continue to offer fair prices, friendly and quality service, and timely. We look forward to your next visit to our shop!

name: Gregg Loney
text: Long story as short as possible! I’m driving from Orlando to Las Vegas with a car load and 3 pets. I drove in with my car acting up and they went right to work. They kept me updated with the progress and about 2 days later I had my car back in perfect working ordering! I have no idea what this kind of work is worth with parts and labor but having peace of mind is worth it all.

resp.text: Gregg, we are so happy that we were able to get you back on the road quickly in a vehicle that will get you to your destination! Providing our great customers the peace of mind to travel cross-country is so important to us!

text: Guthrie's Auto Service is very reliable, honest and friendly. They always called for approval with a price quote before performing any work. I highly recommend Terry and his crew for all of your auto service needs.

name: LT Chris_Al
text: I called and scheduled an appointment on a Wednesday for a that Friday.  I had never been in before as I haven’t lived in Cullman long. The guy at the front took my info and they had my car in within a few minutes. I was expecting to leave it there for the day and had a friend on their way to pick me up.  My car was ready before they got there. (A/C leak). Two days later I get a text from the manager following up to make sure I was satisfied and to make sure the A/C was working properly. That alone will have me going back when I need service again.

resp.text: Chris, we are glad that you had such a positive experience at our shop for your A/C leak. We do our best to be quick and thorough for our customers because you guys are our priority. Thank you for your review and we're happy that we have gained a new customer!

text: Everyone is so nice & helpful. They charge very reasonable rates and do quality work.  They inspected a Volvo i recently purchased and have given me nothing but top notch service and treatment.  Even giving me a ride home.. I definitely will be a returning customer and highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thanks for the recommendation! We appreciate and value all of our customers, when we receive feedback like this it fuels us to keep working hard every day! Thank you!

text: I thoroughly enjoy doing business with the entire family. In fact, they feel like family and carry on conversations with me while I’m there. You definitely get a home town feel and the prices are reasonable

text: This place is AWESOME. I appreciate everything Terry did for me and my truck when it died on a Friday afternoon at closing time. My wife and I were 4 hours from Home and stranded. They charged my mom nearly $30 for a $0.50 headlight bulb and then had the nerve to charge her another $78 to replace the bulb. Don't use them unless you want to be conned .

Update: They obviously can't read either. It was my mom that they overcharged, not me.

resp.text:
Jared,

Customer service and honesty are what we take the most pride in here at Guthrie's Auto Service. Unfortunately, we are unable to find anybody in our system by the name of Jared Lumpkin. If you could reach out to us at your earliest convenience, we would love to hear more about your experience and how what we can address your concerns and make it right by you. (256) 739-1690

Thank you.

name: Andrew Roberts
text: Spent over $1200 and never got the problem fixed. Brought my car in and told them exactly what was going on. They misdiagnosed it twice and charged me over $1200. After the second time, I decided to tackle the problem myself. 2 hours of researching forums and a $15 sensor from autozone fixed the problem. Steer clear of this shop. Their mechanics are not properly trained.

resp.text:
Andrew – We cannot find any Andrew Roberts as a customer since 2012, and that was for only $185. We did try to call the last number in our records to reach out, but that number no longer works.  Perhaps this review was incorrectly posted to the wrong business?

If you visited us under another name, we would like to talk and better understand this situation, as we always educate customers about concerns first, and never sell services or repairs they do not need.  205-663-6088.  Thank you.

text: Ran into some car problems while on a family road trip and they were able to get me in and out very quickly! The mechanics are fabulous.

text:
I recently took my older model truck in for extensive repairs.  The work was expertly done exactly as agreed to, at the cost agreed to, and in a timely manner.
I will definitely be a regular customer.

resp.text: Bruce - we are grateful to have earned your trust!  We appreciate the kind review.

name: Jason Naron
text: Melton Automotive is great including Doug and everyone he has on staff.  My wife and I have used Melton for over 13 years and they have worked on all of our cars at a reasonable cost.  They have always been honest regarding work estimates for service/repair and have completed each repair thoroughly.

name: Charles Boyd
text: Poor communication and double talk - two bad experiences in a row. I would steer away from this place. Maybe they were good at one time but not any more.  I want to do loyal business with an honest repair shop. This isn’t it!

resp.text:
Mr Boyd -  1) Our communication with our customer, your son, was clear.  2) Your son only paid for the diagnostic on his first visit, chose not to make repairs, and was appreciative of our thoroughness. 3) After taking his vehicle to another shop that made some attempt at repairs, he returned to us asking us to fix a couple of the critical issues of the many we diagnosed.  The fact that some key parts needed are unavailable for this particular vehicle is no fault of his or ourselves or speak to the skill and talent of our technician, nor the honesty of our business. 4) After we communicated to your son we could not source parts needed, we agreed to remove the parts we had already installed and did not charge his any labor for this authorized work.

We are disappointed to find a review not based on your own experience with us a customer.  Negative reviews with no merit harm our business and our hard-working employees and their families.  Had you been involved in each piece of communication, you would find our recommendations were in the best interests of your son, were clear, and in the end – your son did not pay for parts or any of the hours of work our technician performed.  We understand your sons vehicle needs are very frustrating. We hope he finds a solution quickly, and you get your own vehicle back soon.  If any customer ever has questions or concerns, I am always available to help at 205-663-6088. - Doug Melton

name: Whit Allen
text: Melton's was recommended to me from a friend who has been using them for years.  My car was repaired and returned in an expected time frame and cost under estimated price.  04 Tundra.  Very pleased and will be back when necessary.

resp.text: Whit - We appreciate the review and the 5 stars!  Thank you for the kind words.

resp.text: Thank you Merry for the wonderful review! We are always more than happy to help customers our with whatever their needs are! Thank you for putting your trust in us!

text: Mike did excellent on my Lexus. He ran diagnostics on my car first to make sure it really needed a complete transmission first and not just a set of solenoids or something else. Flushed my system to get rid of all the old metal shavings from the old transmission. Needless to say he went above and beyond and for a extremely fair price. He definitely gave me a great deal!!! This is exactly why I used him before when my Honda transmission needed rebuilt.  Thank you again Mike and guys for another excellent job well done! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

text: Best auto shop I have been to in a while.. friendly service had my car back in 2 days he even meet me after hours to pick my car up highly recommend him

name: Courtney Seals
text: I called Transmission King and spoke with a guy named Mike after I explained my problem he advised me to bring it in on Monday morning and he would diagnose it for no charge. I brought it in promptly Monday as advised after I dropped it off a guy named Lee explained to me what they were going to check out and give me a call. 3 days passed and still no call so I stopped by and I was asked by a mechanic what do you want and why was I there if I haven’t received a call from them (rude as possible). I explained to him that I was concerned about my transmission and he stated that he test drove it and it has lost reverse so he has to get it up on the rack and then he will call me when they figure it out. Day 4 mike calls and ask how do you start your truck I told him I usually start it with the key. He said that he needs me to come get it started so I went up there and waited for over an hour for Mike to show up. Finally he shows up and he tells me to get it started and he doesn’t know anything about motors he is a transmission specialist. Mike diagnosed the problem as a bad starter I had to wait for a mechanic to take off the starter. While I’m searching for a starter Mike calls and tells me that they are leaving  for the day and they need me to lock up my truck and put the starter on so he can get it fixed. So I finally make it back with the new starter and I had to pay  a mechanic to come meet me at the truck and install it only to find out my bolts are missing. Therefore, I call Mike he doesn’t answer my calls. As a result,  I had to call a tow truck company Friday morning so I wouldn’t have to deal with an unprofessional transmission company.   John and his team of real mechanics from Southern Transmission diagnosed the issue when it rolled off the tow truck which was loose battery cable and truck started running immediately. Thank you for wasting my time and money Transmission Clowns!

text: Oh.My.Goodness. Where to start? Working on/fixing my transmission I'm sure ended up being a nightmare for these guys but WOW! I am so impressed with Mike and his crew. text: Dropped off my car so they could diagnose what was wrong with my transmission. Five hours later, they finally call me to come pick it up. When I tried to talk to them about what the paper meant and what I could do, I was met with rude, short responses until they man left mid-conversation and ignored me.

name: Jason Morris
text: They're too busy for being a transmission shop to do a simple transmission service even though there a transmission business

name: LC McDonald
text: Need someone to look at my truck and they were uncaring maybe next week I don't think so I think that there is so much work out there that they don't care if you use them or not maybe we need to start making service providers earn our business again instead of just taking what ever they give us

name: Vidhu Kapur
text: Worst experience ever! They are rude and treat people terribly. I don't know how they are still in business. Take your vehicle anywhere else.

name: Aaron Ryals
text: I purchased a brand new vehicle from them April 29th. The service until the sell was made was nothing short of phenomenal. However, it ended there. It’s now been 5 weeks and they still haven’t sent my paperwork to my county for me to be able to purchase my tag. My wife and I have called multiple times and we get the same response. We will check and call you back. Guess what....no one ever calls back. I’m completely frustrated and have received warnings for no tag, so I now have a vehicle I can’t drive because I’m way beyond my 10 business days to have a tag. I recommend you shop somewhere else. I should have paid more and purchased local.

name: Mohammed ALKhateeb
text: Love the service,  love the cars and every one friendly!

name: tina morgan
text:
We purchased a renegade from Mikail. He was very helpful and made it a very easy purchase.
The entire staff also made us feel welcome which we’ve had bad experiences at other dealerships. We will definitely buy from them again! Thank you Mikail!

name: A. Mck80
text: My experience at Autonation was awesome. My service advisor was Jason Williams and he saw to it that I had awesome service. Not only did he greet me when I drove up to the service center, but he made sure I had beverages to drink, he checked in with frequently to keep me informed of the progress they were making on automobile, and he saw to it that I received the services I requested and I received them in a timely manner. He was absolutely awesome and I will come back again.

name: LaToya B
text: This place was the absolute worse place I ever been to for car repair service. They were very unprofessional. They lied to me and told me my services would be covered under warranty. They said they called and then told me later warranty was not covering. My car went into the shop running and was there for 3 weeks. When I tried to go get it now they are saying it needs a whole new motor. It was so many levels to this, but I would never in my life ever buy a Dodge and I will never go to that dealership again. Everyone that work there is a complete joke.

name: Christopher Peters
text: They have trouble wearing masks correctly. Also, the Service department treats customers like an after thought.

name: jan vickers
text: automation is awesome! they bought my vehicle and found the exact suv I wanted!! Alexis was so sweet, and oh so helpful!

name: Jackie Camp
text: When my 2014 Chrysler 200 needs service I take it to AutoNation because they are professional and they check everything to make sure no issues arise.  When it's going to be a long wait they come and let you know were they are on each step of repair.  They always have coffee and water if needed.  They also check on recall parts so you want have to come back they fix it doing your service visit.  They always offer other discounts on oil changes, tires and other necessities.  I wouldn't take my Chrysler anywhere else.

name: Matt Montenegro
text: Some of the most sleezy people that give all car sales men a bad name. Purchased a used vehicle from this dealership in May of 2020. I was sold when I was told that my vehicle had an Auto Nation warranty of "90 days or 4,000 miles." Sounds great doesn't it? Well after being hurried along in signing paperwork so the vehicle could be mine I was very happy with my purchase. However, less than a month later, and still well within my "warranty" coverage period I got a Christmas tree of lights on my dashboard. I was told to take it to its dealership and from there I could then make the claim. When I called to make the claim, Auto Nation's warranty service said there was no vehicle with my VIN in the system. I then called the manager there who told me, "I never signed any contract stating I had a warranty and it doesn't matter what I was told because it isn't in writing." I realized the manager was right about this however, I was being told one thing then they intentionally rushed me through signing paperwork so that I wouldn't catch that I never signed anything for my "warranty". The deceptive methods of these people shows that they are talented at one thing and, one thing only and, that is lying to people. These people are clearly slimy and cannot be trusted, save yourself the hassle and do not purchase a vehicle from here. Learn from my mistake, don't come here. Where ever you do go, whatever you are offered make sure it is in writing!!!!

name: William Mott
text: The two service advisors I usually deal with are Michael Robinson and Ken Baker; they are always friendly and helpful. I dropped off my truck for service (oil change, tire rotation, etc.) and Ken Baker called back to notify me that my vehicle was ready. As far I know, the work was done satisfactorily.

name: Charles Bailey
text: I’ve never had any problems with them. Good quality work on time. They’ll tell you if something else needs to be looked at.

name: Samantha Stefan
text: I have purchased 3 Vehicles from this Dealership with my Husband and have had the same salesman Austyn ! He is Humble and Honest and that means a lot these days when purchasing a vehicle. They met my expectations and we will continue to buy from here as long as he is there. The best experiences I have ever had at any Dealership and I have bought many vehicles in my lifetime!!! Thank you Austyn you Rock !!!

name: Alfonso Packer
text: Consumer service was very poor. Upon arrival to pick up my car after recall work I had to stand in the lobby for 20mins before I was even acknowledged to get help. Then the service guy who said he had my paper so he would him me continued a phone call for an additional 30 mins. It didn’t bother me until I heard the conversation, which seemed personal not AutoNation business related, so I decided to go to parts while I waited to get so things. That department was great. After finishing up he still was on phone so I went to someone else to see if I could be helped then he decided to pull up my paperwork and noticed it was a recall job and only need a signature and to hand me my keys. I will never probably use the service department if that was a example of the customer service to expect.

name: Richard Dodson
text: Had some warranty work done on my 2019 Ram 1500. Troy was very knowledgeable of what needed to be done, and the service technicians did a great with the small issues that had, andchad my truck ready to go in a timely manner. Great job Autonation team.

name: Ms. Kay
text: Great service team. Ken was extremely patient throughout the journey. I experienced some flood damage in September 2019 that required major repairs to include a rental for a few weeks. Updates were offered and a complete thorough summary of what was serviced. Ken and the team wereprofessional. My vehicle was as showroom ready as the day I purchased it from them. Roll Tide.

name: Daijha Doss
text: NONE of my experiences at autonation have been pleasant. I’m either here all day or have to leave my car for days at a time because they can’t seem to do their jobs. My car was there for 2 days just to get the battery changed (I kid you not). Now I’m waiting on a part for my car and dear lord you would think they had to actually build the part themselves. I’ve been told 3 different stories about this part. I’ve had my car for almost 4 years now and EVERY SINGLE TIME I’m in there someone is upset about how they run this place. Now I’m that someone. Thanks for nothing Autonation. Keep up the good work.

name: Rick McNeill
text: I have dealt with Tommy Johnson on multiple occasions and he has always been courteous and professional.

name: Amir Sahori
text: Very unprofessional staff. 7 hour oil change while I was stuck at the mall. No service or anyone to help get me anywhere. Was given a call 20 min before closing time and said that my ride was ready, got there 40 min later due to traffic and they said they closed. So honestly never doing business with this dealership ever again. I suggest everyone get oil changes at Honda rather than this dealership... buy your cars somewhere else, the bad service outweighs the quality of their trucks.

name: Samuel Alston IV
text: I was completely satisfied with the Service Advisor, Mike Robinson’s eagerness and prompt service to my problem. I definitely enjoyed the awesome service. I will recommend him to friends and colleagues. Also, Autonation as somewhere to go for all their car related needs.

name: Janet Wright
text:
Great company, great atmosphere, and it was awesome working with Chris and Austin
They made us feel at easy and comfortable
My husband and I would definitely do business with this company again
Thanks guys

name: Natalia Hornbuckle
text: Great experience from beginning to end!!! Salesman (Sondra) not overbearing, very professional, cordial and kind. Ralph in Finance great personality. Wonderful experience.

name: Scott Boyd
text: The staff there worked out a great deal for me on my purchase of a 2020 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Rubicon.

name: Dana Adcock
text: 10 years ago we bought a new Jeep Grand Cherokee.   No one has ever touched this car but Auto Nation.  A couple months age my husband took the car in for repair.  A new condenser had to be installed.  After the work was completed, when we picked the car up, the dash lights were out.   We were told there would be an additional $300 or more to fix it.  This was very shabby business as it was fine before the work was done.   I’ve had a couple of issues with this establishment but let it go but this is going to far to expect us to pay for something that was broken while a very expensive repair was being done on the car.

name: Daniel Eisrnhard
text: Sid was very helpful throughout the whole process of repairing my wife’s vehicle through the extended warranty.  He spent time on the phone dealing with my warranty company and when it came time he even drove me in his own vehicle to the rental company.

name: Diane Krause
text: I took my car in for repair of the power adjustment on the driver seat. The service rep who took care of me made the scheduling and check-in nice and easy and arranged for the shuttle service to take me home. I was disappointed that the AutoNation website didn't allow me to schedule an appointment for repairs online (only maintenance services could be done online). I got a diagnosis and repair quote within a day, but word that it would take a week to get the part in. It turned out to be an additional day for the part to arrive, and I was told the car would be done the following day, but  it took two more days for it to get done. We came from the Houston area where we were used to parts being accessible more quickly, so this wait time may be normal for the Mobile area. The pickup experience was a bit frustrating. I picked up on a Saturday and waited 1 hour 15 minutes to get checked out (was told the car was ready but paperwork had to be done). The service rep kept getting pulled away by walk-ins, phone calls, and I'm not sure what else, but it seemed I kept getting bumped to the back of the line. There may have been more legitimate reasons for the long wait time, but those weren't shared with me. Everyone was nice and helpful, and my car was repaired, but the wait times were a bit disappointing.

name: And P
text: Parts department is a joke. Spent 10 minutes going in circles trying to reach someone there. Eventually just hangup.

name: Cinde Pocase
text: I recently had a recall taken care of on my Jeep Renegade at Auto Nation Jeep in Mobile.  Troy took care of setting up my appointment and getting the repair done. They always do a great job there and take care of me and my car.

name: Darla Wheeler
text: Awesome experience!!! Austyn Long gave us great service. We are very happy with our purchase and will be going there if we need anything in the future.

name: Michael Harris
text: Service was good Michael was good at explaining what I needed. Not sure if I needed all of what I got,but overall I was satisfied.

name: Mr. A.D.
text: Ron did a awsome job getting me in and out fast. He also explained a lot of things I didn't know that I could get for my vehicle.

name: Clausell Huff
text: GREAT SERVICE VERY CLEAN QUALITY VALUE GREAT. THANK YOU

name: Will Powell
text: Shamarcus Mack did his job well as the salesman and was very helpful and friendly. I recommend him completely but AutoNation as a whole, not so much. I bought a car from there on August 26th. I paid cash and was told that I would have the paperwork for the title and so I could get my tag, in about 10 days but to allow 20. It’s weird to me that I didn’t get the title that day but now it has been a month and I still don’t have the paperwork. I’m still driving around with no tag, just the temp tag.

name: John Boy Gordon
text: I WORK THERE

name: Scott Ford
text: I drove about an hour away from home to sell my car to Autonation because they were willing to give me substantially more than other car buying services.  To be realistic the price was still under the book value for the vehicle, but no messing around, just a reliable sale.  I would say from the time I drove in to the time I left with a check was less than an hour and they gave me 50% more than what Carmax offered.  Karen in the online department was great to sit with while the service guys did a quick inspection and prepared the paperwork and check.  If you're looking to sell a vehicle and don't want to mess with CL or haggle with another dealer, autonation was great for me.

name: Tomecia Watts
text: I had the best experience ever. I went in to purchase one vehicle and walked out with 2 new vehicles. I'm very excited about my purchases and I would highly reccomend my salesperson Mykel. Charlie also made the experience  wonderful as well.

text: I was broke down. On my way to New York as I am a transporter.Fred stopped everything to build me a new transmission and had me back on the road the next day !! Donna kept me as calm as she could . I highly recommend Barac Transmission . Thank you so much for the excellent service .Jesnna B

text: I tried to spend some money on my truck. He took it for a test drive to see what was wrong with the transmission. He said "you can heal the sick, but you can't raise the dead." He said he could flush the transmission like I asked, but it wouldn't fix the problem. I appreciated his honesty and tried to tip him, but he refused my money. Also, I didn't have an appointment, I just showed up and he took time to help me out without making me wait. Very nice, honest, helpful guy.

Hey if you want someone to tell you straight up what's going on then see Tim. If you don't then keep screwing up your transmission. Tim has ben doing this all his life, if he says it is bad then it is.
Great guy to know.

name: craig martin
text: These guys are amazing! Quality work every time at unbelievable speed and low low prices! They DON'T try to break the bank. I am always speechless as to how cost effective their work is and fast. Thanks guts for ALWAYS being FAIR , FRIENDKY & FAST!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for taking time out of your day to leave such a kind review!

name: Miguel Davis
text: Great and quick service.

resp.text: That’s really nice to hear, thank-you!

name: Mitchell G Lattof Jr
text: I had gone to Pep Boys to get my headlight repaired. After keeping my car for 3 days trying to "diagnose" an electrical problem, Pep Boys informed me that I needed my entire headlight assembly replaced and it would take a week to get the part in and cost $2,700.00. I declined and took my car to Downtown Car Care for a 2nd opinion. After an hour or so, DCC determined that all I needed was a FUSE replaced and a new bulb. DCC saved me $2,500+ and they'll be my first "go-to" place for future repairs. They are extremely professional and friendly and I was very impressed with how clean their shop is. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Mitchell. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us

name: Alison Herlihy
text: Harold and everyone at Downtown Car Care did a great job getting my classic car up and running again! There aren't many mechanics around who can work on a 60+ year old car, let alone who will be totally honest with you about what they can do and do the work for a fair price. I'd recommend Downtown Car Care to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the great recommendation Alison! Always nice to hear from satisfied customers!

name: John Pickering
text:
Super fast, friendly team. The owner greeted me warmly, and his friendly team kept great communication. The price was downright astoundingly good for such a well-kept, professional garage in the downtown area.

I live in the downtown area and Downtown Car Care will be my garage for my maintenance needs from now on.

resp.text: John, thank you so much for the review and excellent feedback! Please come see us again anytime in the future!

name: Brittany Costello
text: Hands down the best experience I’ve ever had with a car repair shop! I got a flat tire just hours before my flight was scheduled to leave and they we’re able to fit me in and finish the job extremely fast, the day before a major holiday! The staff was a delight to work with... Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us, it was our pleasure Brittany!

name: J. Craig Dickson
text: Fast and friendly service. Extremely reasonable rates compared to dealerships and you still have ASE Certified Mechanics that can do the work you can trust! I have known Harold 2 decades and he is as good as they get in bringing resolution to a car issue or concern. I would trust my mom, my wife, my sister and any daughter to go there alone and know they would be well taken care of there! Great job Harold and Chris!!

resp.text: We're delighted to hear how much trust and confidence you have in us! Thanks for the amazing review!

name: Fatima DZ
text: Just moved in town and finally i found a honest guys that can fix my car without breaking other parts. Chris is the guy that you should talk. I will give 7 * to him.

resp.text: Thank you so much Fatima! I appreciate you taking the time to leave a review.

name: Michael Scott
text:
My girlfriend and I recently came into some critical car troubles while we were moving to New Orleans. We stopped in the nearest town which was Mobile. We took our van to Downtown Car Care and they helped us out big time. We were looking at a 1000+ service request to change and fix our transfer case. We didn't have that kind of time or money to stay there and wait for that to happen. It is a 94' so they would have had to track down the part first. Time is money. The dudes at the shop found a temporary way to get our van running safely without even changing it. Ran and still runs like a beaut. Only charged us $20 for the whole thing. Easily could have taken our asses for a ride. Solid people working at this place and would recommend them to anyone if i lived in Mobile.

Thanks for all your help.

resp.text: I’m so glad to hear you had such a positive experience! Thank you!

name: Only Hazardous (Ryan Nichols)
text: My name is Ryan, and I’ve dealt with Harold personally on MANY accounts and I have never once been dissatisfied. Super friendly guy, honest, and he’ll get the job done quick. 10 out of 10 will do business again!

resp.text: So happy to hear you have always been satisfied with our services. We really appreciate the review you have left us!

name: Unicorn Sparkle with Anne Michael
text: I had a flat tire the other day while I was downtown. The people at Downtown Car Care really took exceptional care of me! They were so friendly and welcoming when I pulled in. They knew I needed my car fixed quickly since it was almost time for carpool that afternoon.  They were quick with patching my tire, and got me back on the road in no time! I will definitely be going back to see Harold at Downtown Car Care!

resp.text: We love hearing from satisfied customers! It makes all the hard work worth it. Thank you!

name: Luke Hildreth
text: They were more then fair with price . I was in a bind and they  were amazing.

resp.text: We're glad we could help, thank you Luke. Take care!

name: john
text: I brought my wife's car in for a few things (power steering pump, alignment, and oil leak) right before we left for vacation. As we were on vacation the shop kept us updated on everything that was going on. (A part was having to be ordered from out of state) The original quote was $1,000 which I was OK with because they wanted to do a transmission flush as well. For the amount of work and parts I was happy with price. They called about half way through our week long trip to give us an update and the shop owner stated he would have it done before we got back or worst case senario, the day we got back. He also stated he thought it would be a bit cheaper, about $950, well that's great. No problem there! So the day we got home he called and said the car was finished and that he was able to do all the work for $860!!! He very well could have charged me the $1000 and I would have gladly payed. He instead did the honorable thing and charged me what it cost him! Also, very clean shop!!

resp.text: Thank you, John! We’re thrilled that you’re happy with our services.

name: Deona Elaine
text: I was on my way to New Orleans and blew a tire on the interstate on the way. Downtown car care was the closest place to me and I’m so glad I was able to get their help. As soon as I called, they sent a tow truck and the owner was able to work with me on the cost of the tire I needed. Because I had a security bolt on my wheel and didn’t have the key for it, they had to remove the bolt — and they handled it for free! Instead of replacing both tires in the back, they only replaced the one that blew after looking at the condition of the other wheel which was super helpful since I told them I was on a budget. Since I’m a female, I’ve always felt wary of mechanics, but since visiting this shop, they’ve restored my faith in the business! Thank you for your hard work, flexibility, and kindness!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review, Deona! We take great strides to make sure our clients are satisfied and appreciate when a client sees that we work hard on their behalf.

name: John Connolly
text: Fast service. Friendly staff. Really helped us out in a bind and got us back on the road again quickly. Breaking down in an unfamiliar area, states away from home, can be daunting. Everyone was exceptional.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave such a thoughtful review, John. It’s customers like you that make our job so enjoyable!

name: Cody Plaisance
text: My wife and I were traveling to Gulf Shores from Baton Rouge for a family vacation and at 3:00 both our rear breaks went out and we managed to get it to Downtown Car Care and they took it in, fixed it, and were back on the road in no time at all. This was all at an extremely reasonable price and would recommend these people to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We hope your vacation goes super awesome!

name: NamJung Homeschool
text:
I am YounJi from University of Alabama. My family and I had a trip to Mobile, and our car stopped working on a roadside. We looked up all the reviews and chose "Downtown Car Care" to help us.

The car broke down at 3pm on Friday. We thought there is no way to fix this car since it was late of the day. However, this place shocked me with the fastest service. They changed the broken alternator and replace to a new one in an hour. We really didn't wait at all. Plus, their customer service was great (the nicest mechanics ever seen!).

I truly recommend this place. This place saved our summer trip.
Again, choose this place for your car repair.

I also want to leave a thank-you note to the crew. Thank you for your amazing service!

resp.text: All in a day’s work, glad you’re happy with the results!

name: Tony Anthony
text: My name is Tony & I am the Service Manager at Colony One Auto Center in Stafford Tx. Our shop pride's itself in excellent customer service, after dealing with Harold Burns/ Chris over a potential catastrophe with one of our customers traveling through Mobile..........I can't be more grateful there are shops like this! These guy's were courteous, immediate and effective, its hard to get all those on the drop of a dime in an emergency situation. If anyone is travelling through Mobile (or near) or live in the area of, don't take my word for it, give these guy's a try! My thanks and gratitude for all you did Mr. Burns, Chris and the business as a whole!!!!!

name: LJ Pack
text: These people have communication issues. We went to make a deal on a used vehicle. We almost made the deal twice. After making our down payment and payment requirements very clear, the sales persons involved went to get approval. When they returned, the vehicle had been discounted, but they added a "fee." That's the only thing he would say, "a fee." They were trying to deliberately be vauge and, in our opinion, dishonest. After discussing their "fee," we never actually achieved full disclosure. We were told the vehicle was at a different dealership within our city and we could go there to finalize the deal. They said that they would call ahead and we should just go over there. Our credit had already been run multiple times, and we had received approval from the credit company. With this in mind, we went to the other dealership location. As we arrived at the other location, they hadn't been given all the details as we had been led to believe. So the process began again, running in circles of double talk and running our credit again... We left at closing time and expected a phone call the next day to complete the deal... That has yet to happen days later. I used to have great respect for Greenway Automotive. It appears that Greenway has only taken over these dealerships at face value, and the same crooks that were already in place are still running things just like they always have. Avoid Greenway Honda in Florence, AL, and Greenway Chevy in Muscle Shoals, AL, if you are planning to make a deal on a used car. They are not to be trusted unless you have the cash to pay up front or your own financing.

resp.text: LJ, we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience. This is not the level of customer service that we strive to provide at Greenway. We take customer satisfaction very seriously and we hope to have another opportunity to show you that. Should you wish to discuss this matter further, please feel free to reach out to our General Manager, Jesse Gouvin, at jessegouvin@greenway.com. Thank you for your patience.

name: David Woods
text: Message #2 Besides Michael Anders & Mr. Burnett & General mgr and others I also loved the service dept at Greenway Honda of Florence. The whole dealership receives 5 stars from me and I shopped around & they had the best price on my new truck.

They charged me a small fee to look over the car n try to find my throttle delay issue. But they came up with nothing. They were very nice tho! Seem like good people. They offered to continue driving it and keep looking n checking codes n everything without further charge.
Should they find an issue they would let me know then fix it and the money already put toward it would take away from the charge of whatever it cost to fix whatever problem.
Good people. Never found my problem, BUT the more i research n take it around everyone says its just the ford mustang throttle delay every one of them has. Some sort of built in issue from the factory ford did to make it 60% responsive instead of 100%. Also something about the time it takes to catch up to the torque converter or something. Idk. Still learning.
Good people tho, honest people. I would recommend them. They checked more than my transmission trying to find any issue.

name: Roy Hunt
text:
Everyone very hush hush, talking  why looking somewhere else, very pessimistic, Doomsday attitude. I know it's all to protect them from liability suits. What ever happened to trust, recommendations, honest opinions? Every answer to every question seemed will rehearsed. Two days later my alternator goes out! Maybe a coincidence, but it seems like everyone I put my trust in the professionals, things start going wrong with my car. Don't trust mechanics, lawyers, maintenance individuals, had one of them tell me, "if we fix it too well, we'll be out of a job, always have to leave something for another day." There's no real honest people in this area, not anymore. Bureaucrats have got their fingers into everything. Law suits are the "American Way!" So you can't really blame them to avoid taking responsibility for their actions. I know what my part costs, they were going to charge me nearly $500 in labor to loosen and tighten bout 6 bolts? A little extreme, they did an estimate but I never got to see it, I asked to see the defective part, but was given the excuse we would have to put it back on the lift. Since it wasn't on the lift, they had no plans to fix it!

Allen from Phenix Firestone called, his only concern was why I was so critical of him. I thought that was clear, but this was the second time I took this vehicle there for the same issue, the first time I was told nothing was wrong with it. In any case in order to resolve the problem Allen stated, "we're not working in your cars anymore!" I guess I hurt his feelings?

I used to love taking a vehicle to Phenix Firestone, always felt like they were looking out for me, always trusted them! Now I get the feeling I'm unimportant, it's really changed over the years!

Enough said hope you all have a great holiday I'll be home fixing my cars! LoL!

resp.text: Roy, thank you for taking the time to leave a thorough review! We welcome all feedback as hearing from our customers is the best way we can improve our business. We apologize for any inconvenience. Take care.

name: Julie Hughes
text:
I had an appointment for an oil change at 10:00 am. I was told that it would be ready in a couple of hours.  I left my car for 4 hours. When I arrived at 2 pm, Kyle didn’t know about my car. When he finally found the paperwork, he said,”they can put it on the rack now.”  I informed him that I had to be home by 3 pm and I live an hour away and to please just bring me my keys. He brought my keys, rudely handed them to me and said,”Bye.”
I was not rude to him. I did tell him that this happened before and that I just needed my keys.
I am more disappointed in the way he handled this. He never once apologized and seemed annoyed that I couldn’t wait.  I think 4 hours is plenty of time for a 15 min. oil change.
Customer service goes a long way!

name: Dorothy Carter
text: I was in the service  department  yesterday  I had another  service   associate. I hate too give a  bad review because  I have been  dealing  with  Nissan  since  2014 this associate  name is ADAM. MONTGOMERY he doesn't have good customer  service  skills. I watch  the other  associate  come in and out and communicate  with customers.He never communicate  beyond checkin.This was first  time the lady a the desk call too sign out for my car.I had go back in tooask for the oil sticker that goes in the window. He did enforce. me my car was ready. Maybe he was upset because  I told him I didn't  need a tire rotation  because I DID one the last visit .I just purchase  this car in August  last year. Next time I will get someone else in the service  department  not him. I Jim Burke  Nissan Sales and Service But Adam Montgomery  is not a good  associate .

name: Beth Jeszka
text:
If I could give negative stars I would. I dropped my 2005 Nissan Titian off to have some recall work completed, diagnostics ran, O2 sensors replaced and an oil change. I used one of their rental cars, as the truck would not be finished for several days. I left my truck, after giving them a budget of $1500.00, got on to the interstate and went about my day. I woke up in the morning and the car was not there. I talked it over with my roommate and we agreed i should call the police. Long story short, I tried calling Nissan to let them know the situation. I left several messages, tried calling my appointed service tech, sent an email and even had a conversation with the online chat. This happened Wednesday night- Thursday. I finally received a response, via email, stating my truck was finished. Total cost was just over $300.00. The recall work was covered, the cost was for the rental. All of the work I requested to have completed was not finished. The invoice didn't even reflect my request, the issues my truck is having or why I brought to them. In true honesty, they did complete the recall issues.
I will be staying with Benton Nissan or my personal mechanic, lesson learned.

text: Awesome people and service...period...my oil changes are free and I didn't even buy my Nissan from them...also they provide a decent military discount...did it without me even knowing or having to ask once they saw my tag. Wait times can be a little long so watch your timing.

name: Pamela Williams
text: This is by far the BEST Nissan service department I have ever had experience with. We own 3 Nissans our teenage/college kids drive and have about 25 Nissans in our company fleet. Needless to say we have a lot of experience with dealerships and I have not come across one that compares to the superior service Jim Burke Nissan provides! Ron was absolutely amazing helping our two sons who broke down just outside of Birmingham while driving back to Florida from Mississippi. If you want your vehicle worked on by a company that is honest and goes above and beyond this is the service department to go to! Thank you Ron and Jim Burke Nissan! What a top-notch company!

I purchased a 2013 Pathfinder from another dealership but have an extended warranty on the vehicle so I decided to take my SUV to this location. WORST DECISION EVER. I knew it was going to take at least a week and a half to fix my vehicle but, it literally has been 3 weeks that my truck has been in the shop with no updates. I've been told it will be ready 4 different days and my vehicle is still isn't ready. Are they not on a schedule with what vehicles comes in first gets service first? I spoke the Service dept mgr Ron today (9/8) at around 2 p.m and he was suppose to give me a call but it's 4:30 and still no call. Customer Service sucks, finishing in a timely manner is definitely some bull$***
Update: Picked up my SUV on 9/10 everything seems to going good. Mr Ron the service dept mgr made sure my truck was ready before he just handed to me. If it wasn't for him I probably would've have them 0 stars.

text: Unjoint broke on Highway 431 at 3:30 today.  Called several shops and they all said it would be tomorrow before the could work on it.  Called Tim and told him I was passing through on my way to Huntsville and would appreciate if he could work on it today.  He said he would and called a towing company for my truck and he drove his personal truck to bring my work trailer to the shop.  He had only 25 minutes to see what parts he needed before the supply house closed.  He drove to Oxford to get parts and put my truck back together in an hour.  He missed a family dinner to stay late and work on my truck.  I was stranded until tomorrow until I called Tim.  I give praise to him for going above and beyond he had to do.  I am greatful that we crossed paths today.

name: Richard Bradshaw
text: Joe Caretti is the best Auto Transmission mechanic my family has ever ran across. He rebuilt my 4L60E transmission on a forest green and gold 97 K1500. Added the Corvette Servo and Kevlar clutches all for $1800. About 5 days later the brand new torque converter failed and took the transmission down with it. Joe covered the tow bill and rebuilt the transmission again under warranty. Within 1 or 2 work days. You can get any better service than that!

text: This is the best transmisión repair shop to be found I have used them for 18 years they have rebuilt two different transmissions  for me and installed a new one from dealership in a satern veiw  With zero issues  I put 300000 miles on my satern and the z71 had 500380 when the motor give up they done my 02 z71 a month ago I am well satisfied with it also the price is always the best the workmanship is honest and very profesional best in the business hands down

name: Brett Bates
text: The transmission in my 07 Colorado went out, and I called around for quotes for repairs to be done. Out of all quotes received, the best price i was given was $2500. A friend referred me to Joe Caretti, and thank God he did. Caretti said it would take a day or two to get it in. I dropped it off on a Thursday, and the following Monday, it was ready to pick up, and about $1000 cheaper. Truck drives great now. If I have absolutely any transmission issues moving forward, Caretti's is the only place ill go!

resp.text: Thanks Brett, we strive to make sure our customers are treated just as we would expect to be treated.

I will definitely be a repeat customer and will recommend Joe’s to any and everyone!  If you want mechanics that knows how to fix a vehicle that are nice and an honest then take your car here! text: These guys know their stuff! After describing what happened with my transmission, they knew the prob was the torque converter rather than the transmission. Another shop had already changed the transmission, which the new one was bad. I got my original transmission back, and replaced the torque converter, good to go!

name: Peter Delacruz
text: So yesterday day I was traveling from Nashville to Birmingham... stopped for gas... and the SUV wouldn't go into gear.  I called him, explained the situation, and he told me to just get it there. After getting it towed there, Jason and his team jumped right on it... found a bolt has damaged the transmission cooler.  An hour later they had it fixed, test drove it, and cleaned it up.  His price was shockingly low and fair, and I even offer to pay more out of pure gratitude... but he wouldn't take it.  I missed the funeral but made the dinner and saw my family all thanks to them, and I am grateful that there are decent HONEST people out there.  Being a traveler, broke down in a place I didn't know... he could have easily taken advantage of the situation.  Thank you Jason and your team for getting me to Birmingham, and back to Nashville safely... and for helping me see family members I haven't seen in years!

text: We were referred here by a family member and told that my husband's transmission would be done "in a few days". After a week I called to check on it and was told an ambulance had come in and had gotten priority which was completely fine and understandable. This was probably the middle of the week and I was told it would "hopefully be done by that Friday" by a semi rude woman. After another week the car still wasn't finished and I had been told it would be done by Monday I called again and was told by the same pretty rude woman that claimed she was the manager that it wouldn't be done until Wednesday now. When I questioned this she got incredibly rude. They took almost 3 weeks to finish something that should've taken a few days and  I honestly would've rather paid anyone else I could find to do this work. If anyone needs repairs take them elsewhere.

text: Friendly, honest, knowledgeable & professional.  Shop is clean and organized.  Reasonable prices. I have complete confidence in these guys.

name: Stephanie Hawkins
text:
Mike, Trent and the entire crew at Transmatic Transmission are incredible!! They are professional, knowledgeable and very friendly!! They fixed our Infiniti G37! They were able to do a clutch and master cylinder installment with fabrication to the transmission bell housing which improved clutch pedal and shifting response and eliminated his problem of premature friction plate wear! For the work we received the cost was incredible as well!! We highly recommend them!!

Thank you guys - John Perez & family!!

resp.text: Thanks John for taking the time to leave a review & recommendation! Let us know if we can help with anything else.

name: J Steph
text: You won't find another shop in 300 miles with this amount of good reviews. Mike is trustworthy and accountable, it will be repaired right or not at all. Mike rebuilt my 48re in a 2500 ram diesel with heavy clutches, billet servo piston, and a billet torque converter. He had to replace some hard parts and still only charged me what he quoted me. I will say this, it cost 1k less than any other 48re built the same that I could find . It has now been 6 months, pull a 10k lb camper regularly - not a single problem. I feel fortunate to have found this shop, could not be happier with the service and product that I recieved.

resp.text: Glad we could help Joel! Thanks for the recommendation!

name: Michael Lassiter
text: Some of the best people you will ever meet. Honest and trustworthy is an understatement. I have never seen a shop that will invite a customer in to show exactly what the problem is, explain what caused the problem and then gives options and recommendations even if his recommendation is a solution that is less work and less expensive.

resp.text: Thanks you Mike! Thanks for taking time to leave us a great review!

name: Jeffrey Roth
text: We love the service at Transmatic Transmissions.  Mike and Jamie are always very helpful when ever we need them.  We have never had any issues with any repairs and they will make you feel like family. They are the only shop I will ever use.

text:
Transmatic did some warranty work for me last week,  and was very helpful and friendly. I'm sure that warranty work is a pain, but he never gave me any issues and got my vehicle back to me in a very timely manner.

If I'm ever back at Rucker (we always come back: )) and need work done, I'll come here first.

resp.text: Thanks!!

name: Isaac Helvin
text: Needed an air conditioning line welded up on my Chevy pickup. They did a great job! Very professional! Could not ask for better service!

resp.text: Thanks Isaac!

name: C. Herring
text:
Superb service and repair! Mike and Trent are truly professional when it comes to the care and maintenance of your vehicle. Their repair shop is organized and well maintained. Trent came and picked up my truck and delivered to their shop with care. They immediately started the repair and was amazed on how fast they completed the job. After they removed the transmission and before putting it back together, Mike took the time to show me each part, the part that failed, and what parts he was going to install. He also make recommendations on upgrades and suggestions on the care and maintenance on the vehicle after the repair was complete. While removing the transmission and re-installing it, Trent inspected the vehicle components to ensure that any or potential problems were identified along with repair recommendations.
There was no stress and at no time did I feel they were pushing for un-neccessary repairs. I can say that they truly "have your back" on repairing your transmission.
They are like doctors, they want to do a check-up on my truck in two weeks to ensure that everything is operating properly with no leaks. The one year warranty is awesome, but I believe that because of the correct and  proper repair, I won't have to bring it back in for any warranty work. Awesome job Mike and Trent, I know with your high maintenance standards and friendly customer service will take your business far!!! Thanks again!!!!!

resp.text: Wow!! Thank you for taking time to give us a great review & telling our future customers about your experience!

name: Jan Peters
text:
Clean shop, true car mechanics (no parts changer).
Highly recommended!

Trust worthy, has done my race car transmission, the gears on my truck and my wifes van etc. All great prices, tells you and shows you what is wrong and what is needed to be done. He would not start a job unless he has confirmed with the owner. Very honest and will not guide you wrong.

resp.text: Thanks for the repeat business & for leaving us a great review! We value you as a customer. Give us a call with any future needs.

text:
Mike and his guys are absolutely awesome.  I took on a project transmission at my house and was ready to give up.  Mike did everything he could to save me money by keeping my transmission out of his shop.  He gave me so many tips and tricks, and pointers on how to properly build my transmission.  He even stopped by my house to check my work, FOR FREE!

I have spent many hours in the shop with Mike, just watching him work, and he is incredibly thorough.  He is a very honest and trustworthy individual and I would never hesitate to take my vehicles to him if need be.  If you have troubles with your transmission then don't even think about any other shop, GO TO MIKE!!

name: Haley Harding
text: Had an appointment on a Thursday morning for a diagnostic test and when I called around 2pm they said my car was next. Called several times with no response. Finally on Tuesday, five days later, the had ran the diagnostic but informed me that I would need to take my car to another shop to fix it. Very displeased with their service. They kept my car five days and couldn't do a discount or anything. I have no problem paying that but five days just to run a diagnostic is absolutely ridiculous! Will never go back to transmatic transmission due to poor service and rude employees!!

resp.text: Haley, So sorry you felt displeased. Yes, you had an appointment with us Thursday morning to leave it with us so we could properly diagnose your vehicle. However, you brought it that afternoon instead. Yes, it took little longer to get to as it would not start. We are closed Sat & Sunday. When Mike could get it running & get it properly diagnosed it was a problem that needed to be repaired elsewhere. He charges a $75 flat rate diagnostic fee as you were told prior to leaving it. Sorry you feel that is unfair. It took him a lot longer than 1 hour to work on the car to get it running and to then diagnose the problem. Hope you were able to get your vehicle repaired.

name: Josh McGowan
text: Good hardworking honest people working here. I would use again

resp.text: Thanks, Josh! Glad we could help!

name: snooper J
text: These people are dishonest. I am female and took my vehicle there to check on some slipping I have been having on my transmission. I told them IF it needed the fluid change to change it BUT if it need more major work to let me know first. By 4 in the afternoon I didn't hear anything so I called and MIKE said he drove the vehicle and didn't find anything wrong and the fluid was good. So when I went to pick my vehicle up it was in the exact same spot I parked it at and the seat was not even moved. I am really short and MIKE is tall so HE did not check my car and they charged me 75 dollars for nothing and gave me a blank service receipt. I am really disappointed that Mike stooped so low .

resp.text:
Lupe,
It is with sincere apologies that you feel we were dishonest with you.  I spoke with you to let you know that I could not get the problem to show itself and that you could pick up your vehicle.  I am sorry that I was not there when you arrived to get your vehicle. I told you to bring it back by the shop when it was giving you the problem and I would be more than happy to drive it again without charge as sometimes the problem will not show itself.  I was trying to help you and not take advantage of you as had I charged you more and serviced a transmission that is already having problems it would not fix the problem and could possibly make it worse for you.  I did charge you a diagnostic fee for the time I took to test drive your car and to scan it for problems. I am sorry that you feel your car was not moved.  I can assure you that in fact it was moved. As in the email my wife sent you we do value our customers and would have liked an opportunity to have made this right or talked further with you.  We did speak to our employee for not making the ticket note that a diagnostic fee was what you paid $75 for. Sorry for the delay in response as we usually are not checking online reviews. This was brought to our attention by Google. Again, our deepest apologies.

Mike

name: Keith Kraker
text: Very busy shop and hard to get in. A testament to what people thing about the quality of this shop, however, plan at least a month in advance if you need any work done. Called/stopped in four weeks in a row and was told every time to call back a week later. Was never able to have them take a look at my car, much less fix it. Mike was very polite in person but a little brusque on the phone.

resp.text: Your business is appreciated. We will work to fix this and sorry for any inconvenience. Call me if there is anything I can do to help you out if you haven't been able to get your car in anywhere else. Most times the waiting is not a month. We have been blessed to be busy lately. We strive to do quality work and due to limited parking we do not like to take vehicles in until we are ready to work on them. Thank you for your review & again call if I can do anything.

text:
My daughters '05 CR-V had a possible battery-drain/Charging system issue. Battery was dead after the car was sitting for 5 days. She got a jump and headed to Advanced-Auto. They replaced the battery (it needed to be replaced anyway) and then they did a charging system check - inconclusive...it *may* be the alternator .

This is when we  found Whitt's  - they confirmed it was not the charging system but rather a parasitic load on the system,  a 0.6A draw killed her battery over 5 days.  Whitt's found the offending culprit and we were out the door for less than $60.   Very pleased with their service.

text: This was what I experienced a while ago. It was until today I know I got ripped off...a lot. I am new to USA so I don't know a lot of common stuff. text: First off I called the shop told him what was going on with the car he said he would test it and pull it for free as long as I was willing to let him fix it I agreed time comes to get the car and test he says he dosnt know what's wrong and i owe him 158 for test and towing I didn't agree since he said it was free but since he couldn't fix it I paid another lie "don't nobody answer my phone but me so I know I didn't tell u it would be free" ok well who just answer your phone on your so called hour lunch break? big liar would never go back or recommend him to anyone. instead go right down the street to tiger auto they do great work.

name: Linsey Lee
text: At first I thought they did a great job for a great price. My car wouldn't start and I wasn't sure why. I took it in and found out the battery cables were loose. They tightened them for me and told me I should probably get a new battery because the voltage was lower then it should be. But they tightened the cables so much so that it is IMPOSSIBLE to get them off to take the battery in for testing and even bent part of the battery cable. We tried forever to unhook it till the point that the cable broke with the nut still attached to the battery. So now we have to replace both the battery AND the cable. 0 stars for further breaking my car.
