name: T. Ferguson DiazBrothersFan
text: I gave one star because the girl at front is very sweet and there was a helpful guy, but we left car on a Wednesday at 10am. I explained we really needed the car asap because I have cancer and lupus etc and will be hard for me to give people rides to work etc at 5am! They explain there was cars in front of mine (6) Thursday it was to be done...nope! Friday the were sure by then...NO, the mechanic that looked at it had left for the day and weekend. The other mechanics had jobs and they couldn't get to mine...nothing! They need a mechanic for minor jobs like mine (bearings to be replaced) and other mechanics for the bigger jobs...if you got one car and need it done same or next day or actually in three ...don't go here! I feel the mechanic that looked at the car should have just fixed it. Oh they were supposed to have called as well..no such thing happened, the mechanic just didn't want to do the job! I have never taken a car somewhere where they did not have their stuff together like this place! Never even called for a status update or to tell us anything about the car! Taking car to another place who can have work done in one hour!!! The car set there for 3 days!!!!!

name: Carole Juarez
text: Amazing company!!!  We were referred by discount tire. Polite hard-working people. Thank you for putting us back on the road so quickly. Feeling safe Carole

name: Joe Shultz
text:
I went there for a new water pump for a Chevy SUV. A new water pump was installed, but didn't last 100 miles. I returned the vehicle only to have the auto shop refuse to replace the water pump free of charge. I removed the water pump that weekend to find they cross threaded the new water pump and warped the unit. No wonder it did not function properly. After re-tapping a couple of screws and several hours out of my Saturday I replaced the new pump myself. Now I am out the price of another water pump, thanks a lot.

Many people do not know this, but each repair job has an attached amount of time associated with it. So, if an auto center changes your brakes in 30 min but the book says it takes 1.5 hours, then the shop charges you for the extra hour as an extra rake. Now, I do not mind paying the extra as long as the quality matches. This shop may do quick work, but it is not at the quality I am paying for. Poor value given, and they would not make it right either. Basically the repair guy did not remove all the necessary components (like a radiator) to save some time and shoved the water pump in at an angle.

I will never use them again.

name: Heather M
text: Griffin is a lifesaver! My truck blew a spark plug and I had two kids with me along with my husband. We were about 300 miles from home! I thought we were stranded and repair was going to cost a fortune. Griffin used his OWN vehicle to drive 3 exits up to assist us. He was able to get the undamaged spark plug back in and also brought us a brand new coil pack and put it in. He did this repair out of the kindness of his heart and we cannot thank him enough! He was honest from the get go. He could have told us the truck needed a new head or worse and made a ton of money, but he fixed the problem quickly and didn't charge us a fractuon of what he could have! Thank you Griffin, you were our Angel! His shop may be behind sometimes, but he is worth the wait if you want an honest mechanic!

name: Sheree Lewis
text: New owner, great guy great work! I recommend this place for all your auto work .

name: Travis Gibbs
text:
I brought my car and truck to them when they first opened. They fixed both and stuck to fair estimate.

I wouldn't do business with them now after my last experience.

Month 1 & 2
Our car needed a new engine. The shop owner wanted to get an engine from his supplying junkyard. He missed one that became available. This process took about 2 weeks before we decided to find an engine ourselves which he was not happy with but agreed to. He said they could have it put in within a 3 day period. The engine company we bought from needed it done in 10 days for warranty purposes. Griffith used all of the 10 days to because other cars came in front of me while we had to wait on engine. They finally got it in and started but had to send to dealership because the car went into anti-theft mode and wouldn't start. We had to actually arrange the drop off to the dealership ourselves. I feel like we were running his business for him because he was almost never there. The employees even mentioned that problem in passing.

Month 3
We become worried after not hearing anything from dealership or Griffin for about 2.5ish weeks. I had to contact dealership for them to tell me that they told Griffin that the car needed a major fuse panel that could be $1200+. I called Griffin to tell him I approved the install because we really needed the car. It's month 3 folks!

Is it Month 4? Getting close anyway.
We had to go ourselves to the dealership to confront them about not getting to our car. This should be Griffin's job. The dealership says that the part didn't fix the problem. Car still doesn't work. We decide to give up because the car needed another part for $2400 to "maybe" fix. We decide to just give up. Dealership is trying to get more money from us even though they didn't fix the problem. Griffin is trying to put that on us. We said we would pay for his time, but does this seem fair? Griffin himself might be a knowledgable mechanic, but he is a rookie business owner with no organization or management skills of his people.  He wasted a huge amount of our time (3+months), money ($6000+) and stressed my wife and I to no end. We are going to have to scrap our car with a new engine that doesn't run.

They do good oil changes and put a muffler on another car we brought, but he also made me pay for the part up front which shows bad business to me as well.

* FINAL RESULT
paid griffin $1400 because the car ended up not working out. He said he made no money and it would have been $2000 if it had worked + whatever it would be to charge AC. When we walked in to pay he didn't even recognize us. My wife and I talked to this guy several times in person and on phone. The waiting area had mice running around too FYI if you are scared of them. After that we went to the dealer shop that had our car and basically gave it to the tech working on it. he paid for the dealer work and gave us a little cash. When we went to clean the car out I noticed that the driver seat leather looked very dirty and worn. Griffin said he was sorry.

name: Kristina Garrison
text: I am honestly disappointed, this shop has Amazing POTENTIAL. However, I don't feel it is being ran efficiently. I have called with no answer, mupltiple occasions. I also have the concern of the child/childern that are running through shop all day, most days. I have also had to keep from hitting many toys, many times. I believe the shop is in an amazing location, and again has all potential in the wprld. Unfourtnally, right now, I wouldn't recommend it.

name: Chris Ruffin
text:
I moved to McCalla in March of 2015. I was looking for a dependable repair shop that did quality work and that I could become a repeat customer with. I chose Griffin Automotive because they are ASE certified and after using them with 3 vehicles (06 Nissan Altima, 05 Chevy Silverado, & 2015 Nissan Altima) I have had no complaints with them.

They do great work, and are realistic with their estimates. If you are looking for a repair shop with a quick turnaround (meaning hours instead of days) then this may not be the shop for you, but I have a spare vehicle and can leave the vehicle for repairs.  They typically tell me that they have other vehicles in front of mine, but will look at it as soon as they get a free moment. I have sent my cars or truck to them at least 9 times (using both the overnight drop box and just bringing it in) and have only waited longer than a day once (and that was because the part got their late in the evening and I picked it up after work the next day)

I have had multiple types of jobs: brakes pads for Altima and Silverado, rotors for Altima and Silverado,, brake drums for Silverado, oil change for Altima and Silverado, window regulator replacement on Silverado, oil leak repair on Altima, engine mounts on Altima, transfer case replacement Silverado 4x4, along with other normal maintenance type items

name: Brandy Sharpley
text: Spent $190 to OBS installed & speedometer.Wire was loose and OBS light wouldn't go off.Went back for what they said was a 5 minute repair & they claimed they need a lift to fix it which I dropped car off at 8am and they wasn't even working on it at 4 pm. I tried calling them and got hung up on so when I drove up there they were all laying around on couches doing nothing. The guy was rude and the mechanic didn't even know where he had put the keys at. Finally got my keys and just took my car home because they were very unprofessional. Now we will have to go to another mechanic to fix what they messed up. I wouldn't recommend this shop for even a oil change.

name: Michael Beckman
text: Best place to get your car or truck fixed friendly people that works there great place hands down

name: Kris Monfort
text: i had a blow out and had to walk the tire there i Google place it said it was open when I arrived after walking miles they where closed so I had to walk to firestone which was another couple miles away

name: Verbonitz “ROBOT” Troy
text: Great place, chivalry isn't dead!!

name: S Reed
text: If you've been here recently, say in the last three or four months- check your catalitic converter. Its probably not there anymore.

name: Brett Hokr
text: These guys take forever to complete the job and do a poor job of putting it back together properly. My wife's car had the alternator replaced and they left the battery just loose in the tray and instead of hooking up the positive lead to the alternator they simply wedged it in place so that it would drive for a little while before the wire popped off. Please use someone else.

name: Deanmu6uio Paulin
text: I had an emergency flat tire. Instead of making me wait like lots of garages the owner came from behind his counter and fixed my tire and I was on my trip. I will repay his kindness when I get my next set of tires.

name: Ariana Leite
text: DO NOT GO HERE, I REPEAT DO NOT GO HERE!!!! I have never left a bad review for anything but I HAD to for this place. Just know that they will work on other things that they find wrong with the car without getting permission and charging you for it! I went in for a specific problem and they did a number of other fixes on the car that I never gave the "okay" for and expected me to pay double what they originally charged. Then I took the car back because the check engine light came back on so technically they never fixed what I played for. They promised to take care of it and when I went to pick it up the 2nd time they charged me AGAIN! I was told they would take care if it but they didnt. My check engine light came back on the next day and now I am completely broke. Please safe yourself money and the stress and DO NOT GO HERE

name: Dathan Ballard
text: I wouldn't go here.

name: David Stanford
text: Because i work their and we do everything we can to ensure the Drivers safty and proper operating machine whatever automobile it may be we more than likely can fix it

name: Moose Trust
text: Ralph is great, and prices are reasonable.

name: Richard Jensen Criminal Defense Attorney
text: Ralph never lies about what you need and always gives you a straight-up honest appraisal about your car and fixes what's broken. He is always cheaper than the competition and deals with you the old-fashioned way -- he's a man of his word. He has been my only car mechanic since 2013.

name: Nancy Elvy
text: Just picked up my car, early to say 5 star but to this point there have been no surprise charges as are common at other service providers. I was treated well and all services were as explained during initial estimate. This is a shop I will return to!

name: Amy Kibbey
text: We are fans of E&E!  They are very reasonably priced and very practical in fixing our cars.

name: Jill Hall
text: Cannot find the one on one service with Ralph and Chad!  Customer is always right.  Never have been disappointed!

name: Kandi Nichols
text: Although the work done at this E&E location is acceptable, the customer service aspect is severely lacking. Today, I left my keys and car with them just after lunch, left then with my phone number and a quote from them advising that the job would take only a couple of hours. I returned a few hours later only to find the shop had closed up early - more than thirty minutes early- with no notice, no notification regarding my car and its status, and with my keys locked inside the building. I had to arrange transportation while waiting in the winter air because they choose not make one single phone call. Very displeased. Will not use this business again.

name: Un Lee
text: I have been repairing my tires for over 20 years from here. Every repairs were dependable and never a had problem.

name: Nathan O'Neal
text: Ralph has always been good to me.

name: Daniel Moore
text: Not usually one to leave a review especially a bad one, but in this case I have to. I took my car in ti have a radiator replaced, once there i was told a day later that the thermostat should be replaced. Bought a new thermostat and the next day i was told that the housing for the thermostat needs to be replaced. I take that and they said they couldnt put the part matched thermostat on my car then couldnt put the old one back on. After coming up pn a Saturday and sitting in the dollar general accross the street i saw people sitting and eating chips hanging out(maybe they were on break idk) once they saw me in the other parkinglot they moved my car behind the shop(adter walking around it constantly) i wqs told vy the older gentleman that he would go to fix it himself and he wanted to let the sealant cure for a day. I called agead and they said it was done so I picked it up Monday qfter it being there for a week and didnt make it to lily flag dr before it ran hot again. So i have to take it to another shop and they also didnt put the bolts back on my engine cover. I was told to bring the car back because they dont know the size of the bolts.

name: erika smalley
text: They are awesome here. Went to a place around town that was quoting me $1300 for a false fix. These people charged me $600 . Thanks for saving me $800!! I will be a forever customer, and I will refer everyone I know to you!

name: Andrew Christopher Baker
text: Does a great job on everything i think everybody should come here

name: Troy Jason
text: Ralph Eppling is one the .Best people alive to meet and be friends with.

name: John Pettitt
text: These folks are great at giving you the repairs you need at very reasonable prices with no up-selling.  Most complaints are coming from people that don't seem to understand that the real world requires tradeoffs.

name: Tipawan Gallo
text:
One of my tires was losing air so I went to see E&E Service Center around 7:30 AM. The gentlemen was kind of enough to see me so early in the morning and I was in and out within 20 minutes. He patched up my air, gave it some air and charged me only $15.

I don't know the rate of these repairs but $15 seemed fair to me, especially for an emergency.

name: Stanley Gibson
text: Ralph always does me right. I have used his services for years. Someone complained about him closing early one day. He got real sick and went to the hospital about that time so cut him some slack.

name: Mary Young
text: Very polite and did good job

name: Keisha Hunter
text: New to the area and husband recommended Keith’s Transmission.  Honest, friendly, and will treat you right! Will be my go to place for auto repair needs.

name: Christopher Mauldin
text: Mr. Keith's whole team are rock solid. My vehicle needed transmission, new cooler, etc. They smashed it. 1 year warranty. You can't beat it.

name: Nicki Fleshman
text: Awesome workers. Awesome owner

name: Ernest Talley
text: Good Guy  he will treat you right

name: Joshua Leamer
text: They have fair pricing on tires but they quoted me $650 to replace my lower control arm which is a $70 part at most for my vehicle. So they charge almost $600 in labor alone for a roughly 30 minute job.

name: Inez Brooks
text: I’ve had my cars fixed for several reasons on several occasions. They were honest, nice, and affordable. I recommend taking your vehicle for a diagnostic procedure, then allow them to fix your problem. I thank God for them because it’s very hard for women to find honest people to work on our cars. Thank you 😊

name: Donald Hand
text: Very honest person to deal with. Keith and johnny will make sure your  car is repaired right.

name: Gary Broome
text: Half cooked food..

name: Duane Brown
text: Great people, Great work

name: S Hayes
text: These guys are outstanding. Keith and Johnny answered all of my questions and then some. They fully explained everything they did and were very reasonable on the price for transmission work. They do more than transmission work and I will be using them again soon for some other repairs that I just don't have the tools for.

name: Paulina White
text: Very nice staff and very reliable service.

name: Big D
text: I had car problems on a road trip. I thought it was the transmission, so did another mechanic and they sent me to Keith's. Best thing that could have happened. Keith and his team are proactive, professional and really go the extra mile to help you. In less than 30 mins they had determined it wasn't a transmission problem, but they didn't stop there. They tested some ideas and figured out that I was having fuel pump issues. Even though they are a transmission shop, they offered to get the part and get done first thing the following Monday(it was already late on Friday). Then we game planned how I could get it home, I did exactly what he told me and I was able to get it 350 miles back home. Great people! Can't thank them enough.

name: Anthony Brown
text: Good place to change oil and fix and replace tires.  Fix and replace brake. The worker doing good and Good attention.

name: Me Mine
text: The staff at Keith's are amazing! It is a Christian based company! They were helpful, honest and quick!

name: Pamella Stearns
text: Keith's Transmission has a very friendly and professional staff. Mark Turner works there and I didn't even know him and he answered all my transmission questions. There is where I will surely start taking my car for all my service needs. Thanks Keith's and thank you Mark Turner!

name: Russell Still
text: Honest and fair!

name: Tammy .Parks Sims
text: Good hones people

name: William Gaddy
text: Doesn't work on older model Dodge transmission

name: Jeremy Holloway
text: Good honest people.

name: Peggy Kirkland
text: Honest and friendly

name: Samantha Roy
text: I highly recommend this place! My Mom and I were on our way to Charlotte, NC and were planning a night stay in Montgomery. Our battery light on the dashboard came on about 50 miles out. We made it to the hotel that night as the car dies out! We figured it was the alternator. The next morning (btw, this is Christmas Eve), we look on Google for places to service the car and two others whose sites showed opened at 7am didn’t answer the phone. So we called Performance Auto Repair at 7am thinking to leave a message because they open at 7:30am. Well the phone rang once and they answered 30 minutes earlier than their opening time! They worked hard for us, got us a towing service right away and fixed the problem by 10:30 that morning! They were a God send!! Definitely go to them when you need! Thanks guys!!

name: Foxtease Gaming
text: Great customer service on the phone. Had to wait a little bit to get correct person to call me back. But other than that...no complaints

name: Sadeidra Daniel
text: I had a great experience with this business. I have had problems with my air conditioning for months. I took my car to the dealership and it was there for a week and my air conditioning still did not work. I took my car here a few weeks ago, and they had it fixed in less than 48 hours. They were very professional and the price was reasonable, much less than others have charged me for not even fixing the problem. I would recommend this business. They take pride in what they do.

resp.text: Thank you! Glad we could get your A/C repaired.

name: john ade
text: Zach treated me well and set up my truck,a job well done thanks

name: Emerson Paulk
text: Fantastic service as always! I have used them several times and they are always very quick and professional! I will use them again!

name: Jaime Lopez
text: I came in for an injector for my 2019 F350. The helped me out real quick but the repair cost was kinda high. They have mechanics that are Powerstroke specialist.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. Glad we could get you back on the road.

name: Brian Watkins
text: Fast turnaround. Nice staff!

name: Jamaal harris
text: Great job with my truck cover...fast and friendly. I'll be seeing you guys again. I was late for my appointment but they called with a friendly reminder and treated me great. Best in time. Very knowledgeable about all products they carried and compare pricing to help me. Thanks guys

resp.text: Thank you Jamaal. It was our pleasure. We strive to give great service every time.

name: Douglas Hardy
text: Truck was there 4 days and the only thing they were able to diagnose was what I told them the problem was when I brought it to them, and still was charged a diagnostic fee... Oh yea they didn't fix it nor did they even take the time to look at. Thanks for nothing. Total waste of time.

name: shane downum
text: Did the job right the first time, they had to repair someone elses shoddy work. My air conditioner has never been so cold

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mr. Downum. We're glad that we were able to get you back driving comfortably.

name: Ricarda Parrish
text: Even though they weren't able to help with my recent request, Lawrence was kind and knowledgeable. Have used this company in the past, work was done properly the first time. Can't recommend enough!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Parrish. Hopefully we can help next time!

name: James Mason
text: Excellent service. Great folks to work with.Quality work with quick turnaround.  I recommend this auto service to everyone on the capital district area.

name: Alexander Hatch
text: Probably never letting my dealership touch my car again

name: Kama Mason
text: I highly recommend this auto repair shop.. Brandon, the shop supervisor and fellow workers are always willing to help in any way they can. They are up front with the problem and do their best to make it right.

resp.text: Mrs. Mason, thank you for the review! We strive to be honest and upfront with our customers. We look forward to seeing you and Mr. Mason.

name: Robert Annibale
text: Overall great experience and very satisfied with the work done on my truck. I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Annibale. Your truck looks great!  It was our pleasure!

name: Greg Hardy
text: Fast, friendly quality service at a fair price. Can't ask for much more than that.

name: Patrick Tidwell
text: Good job with my battery when I needed a new one despite what AAA said

name: Survive N Thrive
text: Went here with a truck, had tire fixed in a reasonable time. Staff was friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you, let us know if we can help in the future.

name: Kevin Krouse
text:
Disclaimer: This is not intended as bad mouthing. It is purely a report of the facts.*** Okay, I literally walked into the shop. The employees were not rude, so a plus for that. I asked for a quote for Rancho shocks (all four) for my 2001 Dodge Ram 1500. They wanted to sell me each shock for $175/piece. Yes, $175 for one shock X4. Additionally they wanted to charge $14.96 for shop supplies. $715 for parts (including shop supplies...) On top, they wanted $296.97 for labor to install the shocks.

Bottom line: Those shocks are going for $75/shock on Amazon. I understand and support a small mark up. Everybody must make money. However, charging $100 for mark up?? I recommend military personnel boycott this place. I have no bias against this place. I'm not from here, and have no past dealings with them. That is all.

I've attached the estimate for your viewing pleasure.

resp.text: Mr. Krouch, we apologize for your experience. That is not how we do business. We support our military 100%. We would like to have the opportunity to make it right. Please, give us a call or come by during business hours today and we will do our best to make it right.

name: Alice Yelder
text: Had a f250 lifted on fri may 31, I was very disappointed I wanted truck lifted because it was scrubbing, the people there lifted truck like I asked but truck tires were still scrubbing so we asked why someone didn't call since that was the reason we took it there, they weren't concerned about the quality of the work or did it solve the problem they just took the money. This was the first and last time we will ever use them. There expertise should've been used and should've reached out to us and have customer service and just plain sense but all they could see was money. What about fixing the problem and all they could tell us was "we did what you asked", what great regard for customers

resp.text: We’re very sorry that you feel like you had a bad experience. We strive to have good customer service. Give us a call Monday morning or if you’d like, we can call you and we will do what we can to change your experience.

name: Majyst Thalsbane
text: The service was great. I replaced all tje suspension components on my car o er the weekend. I came in and wanted a performance alignment specific to my car and suspension setup. They were able to get extremely close to the measurements, which is normal as all cars are not capable of achieving the perfect requirements. The technician that worked on my car "fixed" a few issues from the work and informed me of the issues. This was a free set of extra eyes. The price was reasonable for the work performed, they basically had to 4 wheel align twice because of the extensive work done to the suspension.  I definately recommend Performance Auto Repair. I will be bringing my other project cars here for similar service.

name: Brian Barth
text: Aaron and staff are great to deal with. Always take our company trucks there and are very pleased with their service. Anything we ask for they always are there for us. Thank you guys!

resp.text: Mr. Barth, Thank you for the review. It is our pleasure taking care of ALL of your fleet maintenance needs.

name: Troy Brown
text: Cant fix foriegn cars

resp.text: Mr. Brown, we are sorry that you did not have a 5 Star experience with Performance Auto Repair. You can give us a call at 334-260-3582 and we will try to help in any way we can.

name: Thomas Davis
text: Had a bad experience was going to work when my box truck lost electrical power and went dead Lawrence Robinson service advisor said it will be $640.00 to fix it was a month for them to call and say it was the alternator and called back saying that thay was trying to crank it and even trying starting fluids which is not good for diesels now truck needs a starter and flywheel that it will $2,500.00 it cost me $640.00 to get my truck back not fixed now i have more problems than i started with

name: Jack Harrington
text: At times my pickup would misfire and lose power. After reading my Nissan check engine light code, Performance Auto Repair replaced the catalytic converter. The check engine light was not on and the truck had a lot more power. However, the truck continued to occasionally misfire and start loosing power. This would last from 1 minute to several minutes before resuming with good power. Without any engine codes indicating the issue, they continued to search for the problem.  The pickup is now repaired and I can't remember when it has run so well. The total cost of repair was most reasonable for what they did.  Thank you Performance and especially Lawrence!  I will be using them for future repairs/service. I will recommend to friends.

name: atcarter75
text: Greated at the door immediately, and the staff had expert advice.

resp.text: Thank you, we're here to help if we can.

name: Bob Atchison
text:
Prior to my recent visits I’d never used this business.  When I walked in I was greeted by no less than two people.

Zack greeted me and asked how he could help.  From that point forward he was very accommodating and helpful.  He would pull the products up on the computer that I was interested in and show me what they looked like on the vehile.  He made excellent suggestions and made it easy to get just what I needed.

The prices were good and the service excellent.  I would highly reccomend Proformance Auto Repair.  Ask for Zack and you’ll be sure to receive excellent service.

Bob

name: Jamie Jamison
text: I have dealt with mostly Lawrence. He is one of the most concerned, considerate and professional sales and service providers at performance.  I would highly recommended this company to anyone. Especially military.  I am retired military to include law enforcement. This is a great company.  Keep up the grand work.

name: Michael Britton
text: These guys take care of my work beast. No matter the repair or maintenance issue. I’m in and out with little to no interruption of my work day. This place rocks. I was allowing Gipson’s to do my service work. I will never allow that to happen as long as Performance is open for business.

resp.text: Mr. Britton, thank you for the review and for your business. It is an honor to take care of your vehicle and at Performance Auto Repair we take pride in doing so in a timely manner and for a fair price.

name: Terrence Coleman (tcoleman701)
text: Was having problems getting my Putco Switchblade Tailgate Bar installed at other places (the dreaded "we only service or install what we sell" spill). However, the guys at Performance Auto were more than willing to install it and my Tailgate Assist on my 2016 Ram 1500 without hesitation and they performed an excellent job! I made sure to get a business card because I most definitely will be a regular customer! Awesome group of guys! Highly recommend for all of your auto needs!

name: Whitney Banks
text: Remember the $400 your company took from me by the second visit for one wheel bearing? Well, I’m being told that the bearing is still bad.

resp.text: Ms. Banks, we strive to perform quality work and make sure that our customers are happy. If one of the wheel bearings that we replaced back in 2017 is bad, it could possibly still be under warranty. Give us a call at (334) 245-6600 and we will gladly set up an appointment for you to come in and we will check it out for you.

name: Rob Rance
text: I strongly recommend this place.  You can find what you want for your truck at reasonable prices with great service.  Their auto technicians are qualified and skilled.  They do both car repair and truck repair which I didn't know till I visited.

name: Tina Stanley
text: My family takes all of our automobiles to Performance Truck & Automotive.  The staff there is very professional, courteous and friendly.  They  always provide quick and great service.  They go out of their way to provide excellent customer service.

name: Audrae Mayo
text:
My boyfriend and I traveled from Kansas City to Montgomery, AL for a business trip last Friday and Saturday.  Unexpectedly, our front brakes went bad, really fast.  I found them by Google, took it in without an appointment on Saturday morning and was done and out within 1.5 hours.  Very friendly and professional.  I did not feel like they were taking advantage of "out-of-town, desperate" travelers.
Lawrence was very helpful, courteous and genuine!!!!  I even received a follow-up call to make sure everything was good and that we made it home safely.  THANK YOU!!!  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

name: S D Butcher (AdventureFamilyInMotion)
text: AWESOME work! Wonderful staff! We looked at the local reviews online before choosing Performance Truck and Automotive Repair and their reputation is legit! Fast, precise, and friendly! There is even a toy chest with toys for kids to play with! I will be back!!! Thank you for your work!

name: Chandler Bise
text: Just got brand new tires on my 13 Jeep JKU. The guys here did an amazing job, correctly on the first time. Ill definitely be coming back for any more work done to my vehicles.

name: Cody Greene
text: I work for Admiral Movers so keeping our fleet of vehicles in check is a key part of our success. Performance Auto does all of our fleet vehicle repairs and maintenance at a very affordable price. I would highly recommend them for any job.

name: Denise Jacobson
text: I have been through 3 different vehicles in 4 years but I haven't changed where I go for automotive repair.  Performance Truck & Automotive takes care of my vehicle.  They communicate clearly my vehicle repair needs, offer fair pricing and the best part is they pick up my vehicle and bring it back when they are done.

name: Jac Chapman
text:
Amazing service and amazing people. You can't beat them. My truck is driving and shifting great.
Thanks for the help.
J. Chapman

name: Lynn Henry
text: I have been very impressed with Performance Truck.  They know a lot about fixing cars and work on them till the job is finished.  Their customer service is excellent and everyone that I have met there is friendly and nice.  Great folks!

name: Joshua Fields
text: Go to vendor for just about everything including light body work. Can't speak highly enough of the service. Would recommend to anyone. I take my personal vehicles and all of my fleet vehicles over.

name: Mike Dean
text: I sat in the lobby for an hour and a half before they told me that they didn't have my size tire and that they should be here any moment. Could have told me a lot sooner. Poor customer service. Will not go back. UPDATED!! I received a call from Lawrence shortly after posting my review. He apologized and was very swift in taking care of me for my inconvenience. That is how you manage your business. They will continue to get my business. Highly recommended! Thanks Lawrence.

name: Venessa Menefee
text: My experience at Performance was superb! The people were very professional, knowlegable and courteous. I trust their work and opinion when it comes to my vehicle. I will come back when I am in need of any type of service on my vehicle.

name: Bonnie L Temple
text: Large regular maintenance time in Santa Fe.  Kept me informed and gave me estimate.  Enjoyable conversation with young man waiting.  Overall pleasant.

name: Dave Ely
text: My Subaru broke down on interstate 65 and AAA had my car towed to this shop.  After a 3 hrs wait for the AAA truck Lawrence saved the remainder of the day.  We had discussed by phone that my fan belt had broken; he took my vehicle information, ordered the part and had it delivered as we waited to arrive.  When we finally got to the shop they recommended a couple of near by restaurants and offered us a ride.  While eating they called to tell me the idler pulley seized and needed replacement.  We returned from lunch and with about 20 more minutes the car was ready to go.  I'd certainly return to this shop for repair work.

name: Lamon Logue
text: Outstanding service !! I was traveling through Montgomery Alabama and my fuel line busted. I almost made it to their shop breaking down just a block away. The service men where very courteous and made arrangements to get my truckto the shop. The rrepair was a difficult one due to the location of the line.They were extremely nice offering me and my girlfriend cold water on this hot summer day even arranged for us to get lunch. For me this is business done right. I wish they were local to me.

name: amanda smith
text: Lawrence, Aaron, and their team at Performance Auto Repair took an unfortunate situation and provided excellent service.

resp.text: Ms. Smith, I’m sorry for any inconvenience. Please email me at aaron11sprayberry@gmail.com and I will send you my phone number or you can email me your phone number so we can try to get this situation fixed ASAP.

name: Bob Wingenfield
text: I have used PTAR for more than 10 years for  my company and private vehicles for tires, periodic maintenance, as well as auto repair.  The staff is courteous and the mechanics treat your vehicle as if it was their own.  When service is required, a simple phone call will get your vehicle picked up, serviced and returned.   Service like that is hard to find these days.  Absolutely five stars for PTAR.

name: seyth smith
text:
Great service
Straight forward and was very pleased with the outcome of the work preformed

name: Rhonda Miller
text: I have a 2010 Silverado. Zach and the guys did an outstanding job on my truck. This is the second truck that I've had a lift installed by PTC. I didn't have the opportunity to meet the technician that installed the lift but none the less his work was flawless. I'm extremely happy with the looks and function of my truck. Thanks Zach.....

name: Raymond Head
text: The service and repair to my truck was done very proficiently. There was a problem after I got my tuck returned to me. When I took the truck back the problem was very quickly repaired and the staff was completely apologetic and helpful in supporting my schedule.

name: Buford Strength
text: Not friendly, everything I've tried to get there they have to order, expensive

name: Joe Pettis
text: I started going to them when I had a tow hitch put on my Saturn Vue, many years ago.  When the warranty ran out on my newer vehicle I noticed they had moved and started using them for a hitch on my current vehicle, oil changes and tire changes or any of my other automotive needs.  I am moving to NC and one thing I will regret is having to go through the hassle of finding another honest mechanic shop to service my automotive maintenance needs.  Great people, honest service.  Need I say more !!!!!!!  hey, they had breakfast the Tuesday I got my oil change and yesterday the coffee was good while they fixed a leaking tire.  Just a small screw in it.   But hey, it's fixed now.

name: colvin conway
text: I work for csx and they do a great job on our hi-rail vehicles, and all other maintenance.

name: Robert Jenkins
text: Front desk people are helpful and happy. Didn't want to pay for new rotors but they assured me it was time. I trust them so I went with it.

name: Joshua Carmichael
text: Performance Truck has always taking good care of our work truck and has made sure they do it right and fast so that they don't take up to much of our work day, so we can keep moving forward..Thanks, from the Ewing Team out of Montgomery

name: Camacho Family
text: These people really know what their doing and they are fair.  They told me up front what it would cost to get the job done.   Instead of cashing in, they explained that my truck was worth a whole lot less than the cost of the repairs.  Of course I did the google thing and started to research all they had told me was wrong with it.  Comparing Ebay prices and the average cost of labor in my area, and the book value of my car.  They were right.  The repairs would have cost more than the truck was worth. They saved me from the money pit that was my car.  I will be returning with all of my car maintenence and will highly recommend their team to anyone needing a honest mechanic.

name: Blackqueen70
text: My name is Tammera. PTC has performed nothing but exceptional service on my suv. They are friendly, knowledgeable and perform quality service on the level that you would expect from a dealership. Also, they are reasonably priced and have a fast service turn around. I highly recommend them to everybody!

name: Wesley Robinson
text: They got my jeep up and running in no time, excellent service. I will definately be back. I had someone else look at it and they referred me to them.

name: Shawn Jamison
text: Fast Service. Fair and Honest Mechanic Work, Which is Hard to Find! Thanks!!

name: John K
text:
Second service trip to PTC for repairs to my 3500 Dually; brakes this time.  Lawrence and I worked out what I needed to upgrade the performance for the heavy trailer I tow and came up with a perfect system.  Yes it was much more than most brake jobs but I wanted something that would last as well perform under towing conditions.

I was referred to PTC from fellow RVer and have been very happy with the quality of service and professionalism I receive from all the staff.  They are pros compared to the Chevy/GMC dealers I have dealt with over the years.

Because of their great service and quality I trust no others with the maintenance of my home hauler.

name: Shonn W.
text: Very good people and honest work 👍🏽

text: The stuff they sale has no price on it. I don't trust the mechanics they have. They will never work on my truck.

name: Daniel Strickland

Thank you Performance for all you do to support the many charity events in the Montgomery and surrounding areas!!

😊😊

name: Dez Kong
text: Had someone refer me to Montgomery Transmission because they said they were the best. However, when I took my Infiniti over to the shop, they did not ask any questions, they just said leave it here and we will look at it, so  I did. I asked them was the transmission bad and they said yea, sure.......? So I purchased a transmission and then they installed it without putting any of the codes back in and some left a few brackets out so wires were hanging from my car and it still has the same issue. I asked them about it and all they could say is, Hey man we only put in transmissions, and that it. Maybe if you are a different color they may be a little more helpful but they are not really trustworthy

I highly recommend bringing your transmission issues here, they are very quick with their work and goes into detail about what your issues are and or could be. Thank you Montgomery Transmission!
-Lance King

name: Kelly Gilmore
text: Eddie and his business was recommended to me and they did not disappoint.  He evaluated my car, was honest about what was wrong, and did all of this in a fast and professional manner.  He and his staff are knowledgeable and very friendly.  I would recommend this business to anyone needing transmission service!

text: thanks Steve. great job. thanks for helping keep our granddaughter safe in her 2011 Toyota Corolla.

name: Angela Patterson
text: I arrived promptly at my appointment time of 8:30am. I didn't leave until 11:44am. Over 3 hours for an oil change and rear brakes. Absolutely unacceptable.

name: Louise Pajak
text: Everyone was very nice and said hello. Also explained where the refreshments were. Recommend. If you need/used car speech to George Jones, he's very nice.

name: Michelle Chestnut
text: I was there for an interview. Some people were a little " dry " and seemed too busy to bother with me. I felt out of place so I didn't even do the interview. Maybe if I was a customer I'd have been less of a problem for the desk guy  walking through the door. I saw a lot of people just relaxing on the phone up front so it seemed the ones in the back and outside were actually working. So see for yourself how you like it this is just my 1st and more than likely last experience at this place.

name: David Wydner
text: The guys did a great job getting my Tacoma in and out. Barely had time to get comfortable in the waiting area.

name: Bobby Hankins
text: Real great service department

name: austin grace
text: Just bought a Tacoma With Zak Stidham, it was an awesome experience!

name: Joel Banyai
text: In the past few months I've had work done and sent multiple friends to this shop. They've fixed cars other shops won't touch (or messed up), and saved my friends and I a ton of money. We all know warranty work doesn't pay the bills, but when an alternator they had rebuilt and installed failed, they had a new alternator swapped in the next morning. On another repair they offered a good used part they had on hand for much cheaper instead of charging for a brand new part. Another car had a strange symptom; they correctly diagnosed two cascading failures up the line and fixed everything. If a repair isn't going to be cost effective, they'll tell you that too.  I'm extremely pleased. You won't go wrong going here.

name: Lisa P
text: Quick service. Great price.

name: Jane Knauss
text: Very nice and knowledgeable. Quick turnaround and reasonable prices. Highly recommend!

name: Alexandria Haley
text: This man does an amazing job with rewiring...

name: Ikram Singh
text:
I think they did a pretty decent/good job on my windshield wipers and front window rotor. Had the car ready the very next day. The guy is a PROFESSIONAL but I think I was OVERLY CHARGED !!
If it was not for the HIGH CHARGE I would definitely visit this place again.

resp.text: We appreciate your business and we believe our prices are very competitive.

name: Josh Knowling
text: I recently took my truck to Russell Brothers with a tricky electrical issue that had persisted despite previous mechanic's best efforts.  I was skeptical at first that a solution would be reached.  Initially, Russell Brothers did fail in their first attempt at correcting it, despite having replaced expensive components.  However, after a couple of return trips, their persistence paid off and they expertly diagnosed and ultimately corrected the issue for good.  I would like to thank technician 'Jim' in particular in showing great integrity, reaching out to me when he knew the issue was not correctly repaired.  Will used their service again in the future, as well as recommend it to others. Thanks fellas!

resp.text: Thank you Josh! We truly appreciate you taking the time for the awesome review!

name: jdblackbelt
text: I have been bringing my vehicles here for service and maintenance for 10 years now. They regularly charge me half what the dealership has quoted me for the same job. They're always busy (as people have caught on they do phenomenal work for fair prices), so sometimes you'll have to wait an extra day for your vehicle, but you'll always save money. Jim and Robbie have always taken care of me, know me by name, and only recommend repairs and maintenance on what's necessary. There's a reason they've been in business since the 70's. Can't recommend them highly enough.

resp.text: That is so very special that you that the time to write such a wonderful review. We appreciate you taking your time to give us such a kind and thoughtful review. Sincerely, thanks so very much!

name: Elizabeth Henson
text: Easy to schedule with, did the work for what they said it would be, and what they said it would be was MUCH less than the dealership quoted.  This is the second time we've had work done there and they've got our business if we need something else done.

name: alicia perez
text: Best place to get my truck fixed. I took my truck in at approximately 12:30 and they were done by 3:00. Excellent prices, friendly guys, really smart. They know what they are doing and are honest to their prices. They are awesome all around. We will continue to keep taking our vehicles there.

resp.text: Thanks so much!!!

name: Jake Self
text: Had to return a few times but they was kinda working me in I still recommend them. Let me clarify this statement instead of changing it. When I say return a few times I mean too fix several problems. Only once was something unfinished properly on my alternator/battery, and had to have it towed back. No extra charge but I did feel that they should've covered the TOW TAG.😂😂😭👌🤘👍✌️

name: Robert Robb
text: Charged me $400 to fix a bad wire going to the AC clutch (no parts).  At $85/hour that means it took them almost 5 hrs to fix.  I had looked at the problem before I brought the car in and had narrowed it down to the AC clutch so I asked when i pick it up if it was on the ground or power side.  He wouldn't tell me .  When I looked under the car I could see where they used a wire jumper like whats used for connecting trailer lights to connect to another ground wire that must have been good.  I had expected 2 to 3 hundred but with the mechanic refusing to answer a simple question left me questioning.

name: Jovan Coates
text: Russell Brothers Auto is the best repair shop in this city hands down.  I have been having my vehicles serviced there for over ten years.  They have kept things running that others have said could not be fixed, or a dealership suggests that it's time to purchase another vehicle.   They work on any make and model of vehicle and can perform any type of maintenance from fluid changes, up to engine replacement.  The staff is friendly and the service top notch.  They have always had my vehicles ready the same day I drop them off.  The value cannot be beat.  They do not suggest needless services just to pad an invoice, if your car is not running or something electrical doesn't work, they will immediately get to the heart of the problem and take care of it.  They stand by their work and I will wholeheartedly recommend to anyone if you need your car repaired take it to Russell Brothers, you won't be disappointed.

resp.text: Thanks so kindly!!!

name: LiqwdE Teryx 4LE (LiqwdE)
text: So far so good. Very understanding. They helped budget my repairs into 3 visit depending on severity of problems. As long as people remember most problems can't be solved same day. Good mechanics, not miracle workers!

resp.text: Appreciate you very much. Thank you for being our customer!

name: Briana Wright
text:
If I could rate it at half a star I would. Avoid this place like the Ebola.
Though Ebola Might be easier to deal with than these clowns.
* NO Communication.
* NO Realistic estimate.
* NO Time frame for repairs to be completed.
* NO Call to authorize ordering of expensive parts.
* NO Friendly service, in fact, acted as if simple questions were a bother to answer, and indeed were NOT answered.

In the End I had my Car towed away to take to elsewhere.. where the car was fixed, and on the road the next day, for the same price as I was charged by these yahoos for ripping apart my dashboard.

name: Thomas Taylor
text:
These guys will fix those cars that no one else will even touch. They repair a Porsche Cayenne (a real PIB to fix) to a 20 year old beater that most would charge more than the car is worth.

The guy that was crabbing about his experience...., If you say "Fix it!" they will fix it. If you say tell me what is wrong and how much, then they will do that as well. BTW, it cost $$ to diagnose and this is sometimes the most expensive part of a repair. Communication is key and it goes both ways.

These guys are about the only honest ones left. They are so good that many dealers around town bring their used cars to them because their own mechanics can neither fix nor diagnose what is wrong with them. Or maybe they just don't want to get their hands dirty!
Jim and his guys will get greasy and keep you on the road!

resp.text: Kind words and much appreciated!

name: Russell Patten
text: Great repair facility. Will go back there again in future if needed. Very helpful and knowledgeable

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words and for being our customer!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review. It is very appreciated!

name: david huey
text: People misdiagnosed my car after I TOLD them what was wrong. Then offered the correct repair for slightly above market value. Gee, thanks but no thanks. Take your car here if you enjoy wasting money

resp.text: We are unsure how to respond since there are no details. Please either post the information or call us and we can address your concerns.

name: chris denton
text: Excellent work! They are top notch mechanics and do excellent elecrical work also. They are straight up and will not take advantage of you.

resp.text: Thanks so much!!

name: z ten
text: I asked for a quote for two sides. I was given a price. I asked if that was the price for both sides. He said yes. Later, after already doing one side, he tells me that it was the price for one side and questioned if I wanted the other side done. I said I would pay for both sides if they took care of the alignment. He said they would. I got the vehicle, immediately noticed the horrible alignment, had it inspected, and was told that the alignment was, as I suspected, terrible.

text: Always quick and direct with addressing the issues you have with your vehicle. Had a much wider skill set than other shops in the area.

resp.text: Thanks so very much for being our customer and taking the time to give us a very nice review!

name: kristi gibbons
text: We've had one good experience with these folks and two bad ones. They have some skilled electrical technicians capable of figuring out difficult electrical issues. Unfortunately, the company WILL take advantage of you financiallly given the opportunity. They failed to honor a warranty on a part they replaced. Another time they overcharged for correcting an easily diagnosable connection problem in the ignition system. No parts were replaced, probably less than an hour of labor was involved, and the bill was a few hundred dollars. When I politely questioned them on the bill, the guy became agitated, tried to change the subject, explained how I was lucky they didn't charge much more to get my car back.

name: T. Barnes
text: I've been using Russell Brothers for 25 years.  Always fair and very good at Auto Electric repairs.

text: Picked up a new Titan XD and could not be happier. Fabulous salespeople and excellent management working with the customers.  The selection of Nissan and Toyota vehicles basically at one location is outstanding.

text: Very nice salesman and staff that we encountered .we love our new car.

name: Ron Rothenstine
text: Had my 2008 Titan serviced ,they left the air breather cover off and didn't put a new air filter in, my add washer fluid warning light came on, they did not rotate my tires, I can only hope they changed my oil and filter

resp.text: Hello Ron. We are so sorry to hear about this visit. We'd love the opportunity to make it right.

name: John Ogden
text: Salesman acted like he didn''t know us

resp.text: Hello John. We are sorry to hear about this. Unfortunately sometimes we do not remember every customer. If you have any further concerns please call our Owner Loyalty Manager at 205-312-0830.

name: Tanycia Philon
text: I brought my 2010 BMW 530i in to have it serviced; might I add I’ve used them numerous times.  I’ve never had a problem with them before.  I received a call saying my cylinder was not performing, and I could come get it because it would need a new motor running me roughly $3k-$4k.  Mind you the guy that helped me was very rude; I asked him what are my options and he said junk it because that’s what I have.  Fast forward twelve months later I  sold the car to a male friend; he had it towed back to Mike & Mike under his name and they replaced the battery and a few minor things for $700.  Ladies please don’t let this happen to you. This was absolutely unbelievable and I really enjoyed how quickly they use to fix my car and get it back to me.  I was truly taken advantage of and lost a good car.

name: Jay Hester
text: If you have a Volkswagen, Mike and Mike's is the place to take it for any repairs. They are extremely knowledgeable and friendly. Gary talked with the warranty company and we had our bug back sooner than expected! I highly recommend them!

name: Queen
text: Very welcoming. I loved the experience. I honestly haven’t taken care of my car in so long and just moved to the area. They took care of it like back home. Will be a regular from now on.

name: Tristen Blackwood
text: If I could give them a 0 I would I have taken my car to them 5 times I have spent $6000 roughly and still haven't got my car fixed plus it's making new noises. Clutch kit was installed wrong writhed on 4v time and still not right

name: Bethany
text: Steer clear if at all possible. Not a good experience. Paid $200 even though couldn’t fix or diagnose problem after a few weeks. We paid though so we could get our car and didn't argue. We go to pick it up and even though drove the car in, was not able to drive it out. Towed to dealership who then fixed it in a day for $140 and has been driving great ever since. The scary part was Mike and TJ were trying to get it back to their shop from dealership so they could have it in their possession once again and up charge us even though we had already paid them once. Fortunately we paid dealership who fixed it and got it back ourselves before they could. Dealership just shook their heads when they heard what was happening. We felt we shouldn’t have to pay Mike’s towing company since our car was no longer drivable after being in their possession and that also upset them.

name: Ron Ross
text: Repairs done fast and at a reasonable price.

name: Corey Eddins
text: Had a full tank of gas when I dropped my car off for repair. When I picked my car up after they were "Finished", my gas tank was almost on Empty. Plus they tried to charge me $600.00 just to put a Mercedes car battery in. I took my car to an actual Mercedes shop and they only charged me $200.00. I thought these people at Mike and mike's were good people, but nope🥀.

name: Angel
text: This is my first time at Mike & Mike's and I am so glad I found this place! The google maps directions took me to the wrong place but when I called, they were very friendly and helped to get me where I needed to be. Mike's prices are fair, the mechanic, TJ was very nice, and they are quick to offer less expensive options for repairs if a replacement is not necessary. Will definitely be coming back for future car care and maintenance!

name: Joseph Traffanstedt
text: They are a good auto shop. Quality work, reasonably fast, and friendly. Had 3 repairs done there so far. Each time work was done in 2 days and fixed properly. Seem to be really honest and good people.

name: Rod Johnson
text: Reached out to get quote regarding fixing my Ford 150 exhaust. I advised someone will contact me back but haven't heard anything since then. Thats been over 3 weeks

name: Shantrice Hadley
text: Great Customer Service and always willing to help!!

name: Busta Smith
text: I called a day before and explained i may have an exhaust leak and would like to make an appointment to fix it. They were nice and said they can look at it. Told me they're usually not swamped and just bring it in any time the next day. I show up the next day and they tell me immediately that they can't work on my car (without even looking at it or asking what car i have) because they don't work on exhausts. But their website claims they're experts and they specialize in German cars. Can't really specialize in something if you're not able to fix exhausts?  I don't know if seeing me in person, not the car, has anything to do with the service (or lack of) I was provided.

name: John Allen Dees
text: Honest, fair, polite, and quick turnaround.  Can’t ask more from an auto service center. Highly recommend.

name: Thomas Whitten
text: Awesome service. Priced right and quick.

name: Michael Sulprizio
text: I found Mike& Mikes by doing a Google map search, which will go down as one of my best finds via google maps EVER. M&Ms fixed an ongoing issue i had for months & was around $150 cheaper from other shops around the area.  Thanks for taking car of my car...

name: Valerie T Porter
text: The absolute best experience you will have with a mechanic. Mike and his staff are extremely knowledgeable, while being fair with his pricing. I am a New Yorker, but have known Mike for at least 10 years, and I would not let anyone else touch my 2006 Volkswagen Passat except Mike. For me and my car, Mike & Mike is the best mechanic in Birmingham. (no, I am not, a paid reviewer.

name: Foster David
text: These guys are nothing short of the best.

name: Dean Ethridge
text: Mike and Mike's is where I will always take my vehicles.  They do a great job and get us in and out of there typically in the same day.  Very knowledgeable staff that are factory certified to work on BMW, Mercedes, Volkswagen and Audi.  They work on domestic too but very satisfied with the work they've done for us.

name: S Underwood
text: I called very upset when my car wouldn’t go into gear and I was stranded an hour and a half away from home. The gentlemen was very kind over the phone and sent someone to help me. The mechanic that came to help was very nice and honest. He explained the problem, got me calmed down, and back on the road.

name: Dean Ethridge
text: Mike and Mike's is where I will always take my vehicles.  They do a great job and get us in and out of there typically in the same day.  Very knowledgeable staff that are factory certified to work on BMW, Mercedes, Volkswagen and Audi.  They work on domestic too but very satisfied with the work they've done for us.

name: Terry Long
text:
I had a drive shaft hanger go out on my Volkswagen Touareg, around 11:00am. I contacted Mike and Mike's they had me bring it in to them (did I mention that this was a Friday?) the diagnosed the problem, ordered new parts, negotiated with my extend warranty provider, made my brother and I feel confortable waiting in the shop and, had my repairs done before 5:00pm. I have since spoken with people that have used them for repairs and all I've heard is great things about them.

Thanks for the great work guys

name: Mo'Nique Martin
text: Everytime I needed service on my car, they would give me the best prices,  the best service. Quick and fast with your car. Tell you everything that's wrong with it and they know how to get the job done. Best autoshop in Alabama that I know of.

name: Elizabeth Rogers
text: Mike has been my trusted go-to mechanic for many years. He helped me initially with repairs for my Volkswagen Jetta and now is helping me with my Subaru Outback. name: Jonathan Hervey (DJ FatMack)
text: Had a transmission replaced with a warranty. 3 months later started having issues. Was asked to bring it back by 2 times. Took it with an appointment the first time no help. Took it with an appointment 2nd time it sat there almost 2 weeks nothing was done. They told me they didn't wanna replace the transmission again if there's a possibility that it could not be the problem. I needed to carry it to the dealer to verify its a transmission issue because they don't have the tools they need to verify it. But you had them when you told me you could replace the transmission at a tune of $3600. Now that you have made the money you won't honor your warranty.

resp.text: I apologize for the inconvenience however that is not at all true. When your vehicle originally came to our center it would jerk and not even move, after diagnosing the obvious transmission issue we discussed a low mile used transmission was the best option for your budget and overall goal of repair.. The original repair was done in April and has been fine until now.  You came back to center for an issue that I agreed is there however the codes being set were manufacturer codes that could not be read by our computer. My recommendation was to have a dealer scan to diag said codes to determine if in fact it was in transmission at which point it would be taken care of under your warranty.. I take a lot of pride in what we do here and would never not repair a vehicle under warranty. In fact in your case with it being a used transmission from a supplier I wouldn't be out anything to repair your transmission if that's the issue. The supplier of your transmission under the warranty would have to provide a replacement unit and compensate our shop for the issue because of there transmission falling prematurely . Again I completely understand your frustration but there is a reason for the instructions given and it certainly wasn't to not honor a warranty. It was simply to gain more information to submit a warranty claim to the supplier to replace the transmission if again it was found to be faulty.. I'm here to fix your car if you choose and I hate you see this issue that way especially after our last discussion and you was completely on board with all of this.

name: Corey Medders
text:
Complaint Description:
Transmission did not last 5 months or 12k miles, now warranty is not being honored. In March of 2018 my transmission gave up in my truck. My family had been using Aamco Trussville since the doors opened, so obviously I would trust them with mine. In July my truck started making noise one morning, next thing I know it had locked up tight before I could even react. Could not even turn the crank with a socket and all the spark plugs out. I called Aamco in Trussvile just to make sure it couldn't be the trans they had just "rebuilt" . I was assured that there was no way a transmission failure could cause an engine to seize like that and they would be happy to price me some engine work. Being in the auto industry myself, I decided I woukd price and engine and install it myself eventually since I had another form of transportation to get me by. Well here I am in Jan. of 19, still in warranty. I have pulled my motor and behold, the transmission is locked up tight, WILL NOT TURN. Motor turns fine now that it is disconnected and has great compression on all cylinders. I contacted Aamco Trussville to tell them my situation and was fully expecting them to be gentlemen and fess up to their mistake. As soon as I mentioned it was out of the truck and I could bring it down for them to see, I was told it would not be under warranty because I pulled it. The only reason I pulled it is because we were all under the assumption (including Aamco) my motor was locked up. They are now saying they are under new management with new staff and can't take my word for someone else that was in the previous staff telling me what they did. Well, Aamco of Trussville is Aamco of Trussville.I just want my truck back. My wife is a stay at home mom and Ive been driving her only form of transportation lately. This is a strange position for both of us to be in, I understand that. But whats right is whats right. I work hard and am an honest man. I feel like I am being taken advantage of and thrown away because they have all the customers they need. I know places like this, cant stand by the product, rotate staff. Cycle continues.

name: Ray
text:
I brought my VW Routan to Trussville AAMCO after my transmission had a couple of slips.  It wasn't something that happened often, but this car is known for transmission issues once it gets high in miles; currently I'm at 167k.

Perry, the service manager, was able to take what little information I could give him about the problem, give me a basic diagnosis and ask me to drop it off so they could look at it.

I dropped it off that evening and the VERY NEXT morning he called, said he could reproduce the problem, find the faults and proposed the fix.  No surprise to me, it did require a complete service on the transmission but they were able to resolve the issue within a day and a half.  For additional peace of mind, the repair came with a warranty that's good at any AAMCO.

I can't imagine taking it to any other shop though.  These guys are friendly, fast professionals.

The car is now spinning like a top and I could not be happier with my service.

Thanks guys!
